story: I am currently building an aquaponics system.  Aquaponics combines growing plants and fish together in a closed loop system. The fish waste feeds the plants with nutrients and the plants clean the water for the fish.  This kind of growing is better for the enviroment as no fertilizers are used and uses up to 90 percent less water than crops grown in dirt.  I need funds to finish building my greenhouse and to add a vertical growing area. I also continually experiment with new and better ways to produce food.  I would like to eventually produce local food as a full-time operation.

story:
What We Are About

A good beer and a good story go together like barley and water, and we want to provide quality beer so you can share your story with the world.  When you take that first sip of refreshing beer, wipe the foam away from your upper lip, and swallow that delicious beverage--at that moment, an imaginary light turns green, and your lips start moving before your mind can shut the flood gate.  You are free to tell your story.  

Novel Brewing Company is owned by a husband and wife team who live in the Golden Gate District of Oakland, CA and are excited for the opportunity to open a brewery and tasting room in their neighborhood.  Their passion for the craft is reflected in their product, and they can’t wait to share it with you.  When their doors open, and the first pint sized page turner is poured, will you be there to help write the first chapter?  

The Beer

You can expect a wide variety of beers to be made by Novel Brewing Company. We are a small brewery that will have the flexibility to experiment and keep things fresh. Some styles to look forward to are the Gose, IPA, English-style Porter, Pils, Dry Stout, English-style Bitter, American Brown Ale, Wheatwine, Black Rye IPA, American Pale Ale, Belgian-style Pale Ale, Belgian-style Dubbel, and Belgian-style Tripel.  

The Perks

Local Pickup and Shipping Options

We plan on hosting a Perk pickup party for those who are local and would like to hangout, have a few beers, and pickup their perks.  Otherwise, we will reach out to you via email to arrange for shipping.  Note: We will only ship within the United States.

Why We Need Money

You may be asking why you should donate your hard earned dough to another crowdfunding campaign?  As it turns out, opening a brewery and tasting room is really freaking expensive!  We need your help.  We've drawn the sap from as many of our currency producing oaks as possible, and we are now only months away from brewing our first batch of beer.  The $25,000 raised through this campaign will allow Novel Brewing Company to finish what we have started.  Your donation will go a long way towards putting our glycol chiller on the roof, pouring a new slab of concrete in the cellar and brewery, and to create a welcoming space to exchange your wild yarns and novel ideas. 

The Plan

In September of 2015, we signed a lease at 6510 San Pablo Ave in Oakland, CA. Since then we have accomplished the following: 

  • Conditional use plan approval from the city of Oakland 
  • Alameda County Environmental Health plan check approval
  • SBA Loan approval
  • Submitted application to CA Dept. of Alcohol Beverage Control
  • Submitted application to Alcohol and Tobacco Tax & Trade Bureau
  • Designed Architectural, Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing, and Structural Plans
  • Submitted drawings to Oakland building department plan check
  • Established hop contracts 
  • Worked with General Contractor to bid project
  • Ordered a custom manufactured brewhouse and fermenters
And that is only the large items.  We continue to be on target for completing construction in April/May 2016 and for opening our tasting room in May/June 2016. In the mean time, we will work on making great beer, and hope to see you around the neighborhood.

Mission

Novel Brewing Company is a narrative told through the art and science of brewing beer for our local community. Within the pages of Novel Brewing Company are chapters that will be written by our tasting room patrons. These chapters will provide nourishment for new stories and the development of new characters. The scenes will extend beyond the boundaries of the brewery and spill into the surrounding neighborhoods, quenching the thirsts of long time friends, sidekicks, and newly discovered cohorts. It is the mission of Novel Brewing Company to help sustain a sense of connectedness through beer and community.

story:
Other Ways You Can Help

My Story & Vision:

My name is Timotheus Greene and I live in Pickering, Ontario with my wife Elisha Greene.  At an early age I had a  love for sci-fi and pop culture when I was first introduced to Star Trek and Star Wars.  As I got older I continued to follow many of the TV shows, movies and documentaries related to those franchises. In addition I also ran a successful fan-based Star Trek website for five years with over 200 fans. This allowed me to connect with a community of passionate fans to learn about their likes and dislikes. I have received a diploma in Small Business Management and worked in retail for over 11 years which encompassed inventory, fulfillment, merchandising and customer service. After attending major pop culture events such as FanExpo Toronto where you are able to meet actors & artists and buy their latest items, I realized that after those events it is very hard to find quality items and to experience the sense of community with those that share the same passion. 

This is where Stuff of Legends comes in, I came up with the concept for Stuff of Legends which will be a pop culture retail store consisting of unique and hard to find items, combined with a café, lounge area, party room and gaming area. I want to provide a place where people can meet up with other fans and enjoy a welcoming atmosphere.  There is no store comparable to it in the Durham Region and this is why I plan to open the Stuff of Legends in the core of Pickering. My hope is to start connecting and building the community in the Durham Region.

 

The Goal & Ways to Support:

Stuff of Legends will be located in Pickering, Ontario near Whites Rd and Kingston Rd and it will be opened 7 days a week.  The amount necessary to start my venture is $80,000.  I have submitted a business plan for a business grant of $50,000 and if accepted would help me start the business.  The purpose of this campaign is to raise $20,000 in hopes to add it to the business grant if accepted and if rejected to apply for a business loan of $80,000.  I feel that this venture would put my knowledge and passion to good use and leave an impact on the pop culture community.  All I need is 200 people to contribute $100 each and I will reach my goal and begin to see this dream come to life! 

Cost Break Down:

  • Lease (First and Last payment + one months rent): $12200
  • Inventory: $15,000
  • Equipment & Furniture: $15,000
  • Store Design & Renovation: $15,000
  • Business Setup ($5000)
  • Business Supplies ($2000)
  • Business Promotion & Advertising ($5000)
  • Employee ($10,800)

           Total = $80,000


Contribution Amounts & Perks:

Keychain: Your choice of either Batman logo, Superman logo or Millennium Falcon keychain.


Funko POP! Mystery Minis: Your choice of Funko POP! Minis valued at $7.99.


ShirtPunch! T-shirt: Your choice of ShirtPunch! T-shirt valued at $10


Stuff of Legends VIP Pass: Receive your choice of a ShirtPunch T-shirt (valued at $10) and an invitation to the Pre-Grand Opening event which allows you to purchase items with a discount of 20%. You will also have the opportunity to enjoy the Stuff of Legends experience prior to the Grand opening for the public.


Funko POP! + VIP Pass: Receive your choice of a Funko POP! figured (valued up to $15) and an invitation to the Pre-Grand Opening event which allows you to purchase items with a discount of 20%. You will also have the opportunity to enjoy the Stuff of Legends experience prior to the Grand opening for the public.


J.O.A.T Tee + VIP Pass: Your choice of a Jack of All Trades T-shirt valued at $25 and receive an invitation to the Pre-Grand Opening event which allows you to purchase items with a discount of 20%. You will also have the opportunity to enjoy the Stuff of Legends experience prior to the Grand opening for the public.

FanExpo Ticket + VIP Pass: Receive a one day ticket to the upcoming FanExpo Canada, September 1st-4th - 2016 (valued at $50) and an invitation to the Pre-Grand Opening event which allows you to purchase items with a discount of 20%. You will also have the opportunity to  the Stuff of Legends experience prior to the Grand opening for the public.


VIP FanExpo Ticket + VIP Pass: Receive one four day VIP pass for the upcoming FanExpo Canada, September 1st-4th (valued at $150) and receive an invitation to the Pre-Grand Opening event which allows you to purchase items with a discount of 20%. You will also have the opportunity to the Stuff of Legends experience prior to the Grand opening for the public.


VIP FanExpo + Photo Op: The "crème de le crème" of the Stuff of Legends perks, receive one four day VIP pass for the upcoming FanExpo Canada, September 1st-4th (valued at $150) plus your choice of photo op and autograph of up to $200 and addition to receiving an invitation to the Pre-Grand Opening event which allows you to purchase items with a discount of 20%. You will also have the opportunity to enjoy the Stuff of Legends experience prior to the Grand opening for the public and to show my appreciation for such great support you will also receive 25% off merchandise or café items in the store for to 6 months!.


HotToys Kylo Ren Collectable: The highly-accurate collectible figure is specially crafted based on the image of Kylo Ren in Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Receive one sixth scale Kylo Ren by HotToys Collectables (valued at $225), one day ticket to the upcoming FanExpo Canada, September 1st-4th - 2016 and an invitation to the Pre-Grand Opening event which allows you to purchase items with a discount of 20%. You will also have the opportunity to enjoy the Stuff of Legends experience prior to the Grand opening day and to show my appreciation for such great support you will also receive 25% off merchandise or café items in the store for up to 6 months!


HotToys Rey & BB-8 Collectable: The highly-accurate collectible figure is specially crafted based on the image of Rey & BB8 in Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Receive one sixth scale Rey & BB8 by HotToys Collectables (valued at $290),  one day ticket to the upcoming FanExpo Canada, September 1st-4th - 2016 and an invitation to the Pre-Grand Opening event which allows you to purchase items with a discount of 20%. You will also have the opportunity to enjoy the Stuff of Legends experience prior to the Grand opening day and to show my appreciation for such great support you will also receive 25% off merchandise or café items in the store for up to 6 months!

 

Becoming Legendary:

Stuff of Legends' goal is to create an outlet where fans can interact with others to improve social skills, create new friendships, provide a place for people to relax and to provide entertainment for the community. 

The core objectives of Stuff of Legends are:

- Customer Service

- Unique Products & Services

- Warm & Inviting Atmosphere

- Community

I believe that these objectives will setup Stuff of Legends for success.

To Contribute

Click Link to Contribute - Thank You!


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute my ask is that you share this campaign to at least 10 people and to share on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram using the hashtag #SOLpickering as well as "Liking & Following" our social feeds below:

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/stuffoflegends

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/stuffof_legends

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/stuffof_legends

Website: http://www.stuffoflegends.ca

story:
Like a food truck, but for the mind.

We saved a traveling library, and drove it from Houston to North Loop in Austin, Texas. Now, we need your help getting it out of the yard and back on the road.

What does it need? 

  • For starters, new Texas permits & registration. 
  • Some vital health care: a new A/C and generator.

  • It's not this truck's first rodeo. It still shows signs of its former lives. We want to give it a new look.

  • It also came with over 2,000 books, and no extra storage. We want to keep the books on board rotating and applicable to different audiences, so we need off-truck storage to hold our excess books.

  • 501(c)3 non-profit application and lawyer fees. We're in the process of applying for 501(c)3 status, so future donations of both money & books can be tax deductible. We feel this is crucial for the continued success of the Book Truck ATX, but it is not cheap.

  • Most importantly, we are asking you to fund the Book Truck ATX's inaugural year. 

How will it work?

Find The Book Truck ATX around town and take a book. 

Keep it forever, share it with a friend, or visit again and swap it out for another. As an incentive, all books returned to the truck will be tallied and top readers will receive invitations, special gifts, and bragging rights. 

For your first book, there will be a suggested donation of $5 to support general operations and community programs such as pop-up book clubs and poetry slams.

Who's behind the wheel?

Jane Field, the mastermind, is a graduate student at University of Texas at Austin's School of Information. A book worm since birth, Jane grew up in a small college town with only one house rule: she could never say she was bored. She's the creative and literary force driving the Book Truck ATX. 

Jane's stepsister, Sarah Hardin-White, rides shotgun. After spending four years working in audience development at a New York City public relations firm, she was bit by the Austin bug last July. Sarah is the Book Truck ATX's operations guru - she makes it all happen. While her taste in books IS improving, we suggest asking her about contemporary art instead. 

Come Check Us Out!

If you are in Austin, we hope you can join us for our Yard Book Swap, taking place Saturday, June 13th from 2-5pm. Email thebooktruckatx@gmail.com for address and details. Unload some books and stock up on some of our duplicates as we sort through the library's collection. We'll also give you a tour of the Book Truck ATX in its current condition. 

I want to help, but I can't contribute financially. 

We need all forms of help!

  1. Like the Book Truck ATX on Facebook, and Follow on Instagram & Twitter. It's the easiest way to show your support, and once we get moving, it's how you'll know where to find your next book.
  2. Spread the word: share our campaign with anyone who loves books, Austin, or both.
  3. Work at or own a friendly coffee shop, bar, or restaurant? Have a Food Truck? Let's partner! 
  4. Have another idea? Thought of something we haven't? We want to hear it!

story:
Short Summary

             My name is Ricardo Burton I am a 16 year old entrepreneur with an innovative business. I started this business with the love of baking and staying healthy while eating great snacks. Growing up in a neighborhood of bad health, I wanted to start a business that would change many people's lives. When you support the business you are not only investing into the business but you are all investing in me. 

What We Need & What You Get
                   With the funding I am not only going to expand the business but I will also give back to the community. The funding will give me the necessary capital I need to distribute enough product to the community.With extra money I will give back to the people who funded me with large amounts by naming one of my new products after them.

The Impact this company has on the community will be very vast.  Not only will I be giving nutritious food to people, but I will be hiring minority teenagers. As well, I will be teaching them the  ins and outs of business and how to start their own business just like I have.



Risks & Challenges

    The  adversity I face  varies  in more ways then one. Marketing , Distribution , and generating sales will have to be the main challenges I will face.  I believe I can not only overcome these challenges but use these challenges to grow my  business. Gaining more experience I won't stop until I create a internationally known brand. Going to school and working with consultants I will focus on overcoming my limitations from Challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

      Other ways people can hep me

1. Help me spread the word of my business and my campaign

2. Email me Advice on expanding my business : Rickcburton@gmail.com

3. Like my Page on Face Book at Delicious and Nutritious

4. Help with opportunities you could offer in the world of business

   Risks & Challenges    The  adversity I face  varies  in more ways then one. Marketing , Distribution , and generating sales will have to be the main challenges I will face.  I believe I can not only overcome these challenges but use these challenges to grow my  business. Gaining more experience I won't stop until I create a internationally known brand. Going to school and working with consultants I will focus on overcoming my limitations from Challenges.    
Other Ways You Can Help       Other ways people can hep me 1. Help me spread the word of my business and my campaign 2. Email me Advice on expanding my business : Rickcburton@gmail.com 3. Like my Page on Face Book at Delicious and Nutritious 4. Help with opportunities you could offer in the world of business

story:
What is WeNote?


WeNote is the smartest way to remember everything, stay organized, and easily keep in touch with your friends, family, and colleagues.

WeNote is the first indoor reminder system that keeps you on track - reminding you of everything at the right time, and in the right place. 

The innovative system, made-up of an app and a proximity sensor (also known as "beacon"), sends you reminders when you enter or exit a specific place and lets you quickly and easily share notes with others - just like a real pinboard! 

How many times have you left the house for the day and forgotten to take out the garbage, lock the door, or grab your wallet, and only realized it when you were stuck in rush hour traffic with no way to turn back? 

How many times have you forgotten about a meeting, or to make an important phone call or send an email that you could change the course of the day (or your career)? 

WeNote can help you in all of these situations and resolve your everyday problems and anxieties. 



Featured on:





Why need WeNote?


Tired of your roommates not taking out the garbage, or dishes just piling up in the sink for weeks on end? Put a WeNote beacon somewhere convenient for everyone and sit back and let the reminder system gently notify you and your roommate of the shared household tasks without you becoming the bad guy. 


Need to send a "message of the day" to all your team to keep them up-to-date? Want to remind the last colleague exiting the office to switch off the coffee machine? Place the WeNote beacon in the office and let it help you coordinate your working group and get all things done.



When you have to take one important thing before you leave the house, put the WeNote beacon in a strategic place, maybe at the front door, and you will receive a reminder when you pass by.



What makes WeNote so special




How does it work


WeNote’s primary purpose is to make your life simpler, so it’s easy to use! Just place the  WeNote proximity sensor,  AKA “beacon”, in a convenient place in your home, office or anywhere else you might need it. It will even work in the car! Then start setting reminders or posting notes to yourself or the people you share the same space with, and receive the notification only when you are around; so always at the right time, and in the right place.




WeNote - The most useful application you’ve ever had


Last year at the MobApp Award SMAU, WeNote won the innovation award. Why? It’s very useful to be able to send and receive notifications only when and where it is necessary. Invite the people you share space with every day and stay connected in an smart way. Let WeNote take care of all of the daily duties and reminders that you need so you can focus on what matters most. Kiss anxiety goodbye!




Technical details 


The WeNote beacon is a very small device, lightweight and easy to install. It communicates with your smartphone via Bluetooth low energy technology when it is in the immediate vicinity. WeNote will be sent with a double-sided adhesive, so you can stick it wherever you want.




Let’s improve our everyday life together!


We’re the first to recognize that we need all of the features that WeNote offers and we firmly believe that it will be of great help to those like us who have a lot of things to remember every day. We really want to make WeNote a reality.

The development of the app is already in the Alpha version for iOS devices. All funds raised will be used to improve the development of the app on both iOS and Android, to add more and more useful functionality and to increase the number of users per site.

If we reach our goal we will be able to provide applications on both platforms, establish ourselves in the market, and integrate our application with other systems, such as IFTTT or with home automation systems. But we need your help and your feedback to improve.



Rewards




Tomorrow is today


WeNote can be integrated in many security and home automation systems. Wouldn’t it be great to have your house alarm activated or your sprinkler system turned off automatically just by leaving or entering the house? If your company develops such systems, contact us to see how we can work together.




Timeline


About us

 


12 people, including electrical engineers, mobile developers, researchers, designers and marketing experts.

Beeapp Srl (Pisa) specializes in developing mobile applications while Blueup Srl (Siena) specializes in electronics.

Together we have joined our skills to provide the best mobile solutions, both in terms of hardware and software.

We met at a trade fair in Milan last fall where Beeapp won the first prize for the most ​​innovative application and quickly realized that working together would be great.

Our mission is to create innovative mobile solutions that connect real life to digital life. Our business is based primarily on B2B and WeNote is our first joint experience in the B2C market. We would love to have your feedback, opinions, comments, or a simple “hello” so please, feel free to contact us at info@wenoteapp.com

Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/wenoteapp

Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/WeNote_app

story:
Short Summary


  • Patrick Lambertz is the founder of Men of the City (MOTC) and has been the overseer of the ministry since 2006. In the ministry's existence, MOTC has met in multiple locations, hosted 4 men's retreats, invited dozens of guest speakers, supported mission trips to 2 foreign countries, been published in the Star Tribune and broadcast on KKMS. Patrick received his pastoral license in 2011 and continues to expand the vision God has given him for men in the Twin Cities and beyond.   
  • Ministry to men is so important to us because we believe if we change the hearts and leadership of men, we can change families, cultures, and our next generations of young men into the maturity that God designed us for.  After-all, with a generation of young men where over 40% are impacted by fatherlessness, where does one go to learn about become a father themselves. Conversely, are "men" in the church in a position to mentor others, or do we find ourselves simply filling empty chairs on Sundays?
  • We believe God gave men a unique call to leadership. Men of the City exists to support men in that endeavor. In our early years we have seen men transform from long-term unemployment into thriving careers and from criminal backgrounds into stable families. After witnessing transformation in these men lives, God has instilled in us a desire to see change in an entire city of men. 
  • We believe that ministry for men should be available to the man who slept through the 6 am men's pancake breakfast at Church.
  • We believe that some men desire to worship with loud drums and electric guitars that will drown out our squeaky voices.
  • We believe we can create and learn biblical lessons from things that can be crushed, exploded, lit on fire.  
  • We believe men bond over fishing stories, cooking food on an open flame and discussing their favorite sports teams. 
  • We believe that a biblical sermon is best debated on a dodgeball court by believers and nonbelievers alike. 
  • We do not shy away from adventure. in fact, it is a characteristic of men designed by God.
  • Of course we want to do this in an encouraging and supporting way where we can.  The magnitude of our vision is great.  It is our aim to become a leading community center and resource for men in all areas of their life including health, finances, employment, leadership, and spirituality.  We will partner and assist local Churches, ministries and non-profit organizations with a weekly destination for their men... one city at a time. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $10,000 for the launch and our first year of ministry.  This allows us to secure a facility, welcome new members with a hot meal, provide educational resources, purchase and maintain equipment, and bless our guest speakers and talent.
  • When you support our ministry, you become a part of our community.  We have designed our perks to give our donors the opportunity to get involved and connected to our community by making it easy to attend one of our large group meetings or events on us.  Our meetings have been described as "surprisingly refreshing."
  • If we do not reach our goal, the entire amount of the funds raised will still get forwarded to Men of the City. 

The Impact

  • On any given Sunday there are 13 million more adult women than men in America’s churches. 
  • This Sunday almost 25 percent of married, churchgoing women will worship without their husbands. 
  • Midweek church activities draw 70 to 80 percent female participants. 
  • The majority of church employees are women (except for ordained clergy, who are overwhelmingly male). 
  • Over 70 percent of the boys who are being raised in church will abandon it during their teens and twenties. Many of these boys will never return.
  • More than 90 percent of American men believe in God, and five out of six call themselves Christians. But only one out of six regularly attend church.
  •  The average man accepts the reality of Jesus Christ, but fails to see any value in going to church. 
  • Foreign churches report gender gaps of 9 women for every adult man in attendance. 
  • Christian universities are becoming convents. The typical Christian college in the U.S. enrolls almost 2 women for every man. 
  • Fewer than 10% of U.S. churches are able to establish or maintain a vibrant men’s ministry.
  • The above stats can be found here: http://bit.ly/1yJJQ0M
  • Men of the City was founded in a large Church setting and thrived under the leadership of a team of lay-leaders.  It continues to be led 100% by volunteers who are enthusiastic about seeing the lives of men change.  Each of them want to see men succeed and become leaders in each area of their life, and most importantly live a life that displays true manhood; caring, helping, generous, tough decision makers, mentors for younger generations. 
  • In the ministry's existence, this community has supported men through escaping organized crime, averted suicide, provide ministry in the prisons, men freed from addiction to substances and sexual sin, baptisms, and seen Christianity become real to religious leaders and Atheists alike.  Men of the City has also seen some of its members go on to be Church leaders and pastors.   

Risks & Challenges

  • The greatest risk the leadership of Men of the City has to face is will men show up? Are men fed up enough with their lifestyles the way they are, meeting the status quo, keeping up with the Jones's, completing their office deadlines, and are they ready for more? Our community has grown to serve over 300 men over the past 8 years.  We hear many of the same stories: "there is nothing like this out there for men", or "I was so encouraged be the testimonies that I too am going to change."   
  • Our challenge is to meet and exceed the expectations of men in the area of ministry.  Why? Stats show that entire FAMILIES are four times more likely to be regular church attenders if the MAN/FATHER (rather than the woman or children) is the one who invites them. Churches need their men to elevate themselves, and we plan to do that through building a tight community by first eliminating the awkwardness and perceptions of what a men's ministry typically looks and feels like.   

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this with your friends, you circle of influences, your spouses, your pastors and ministry leaders or even your coworker.  Maybe your church has a need for a men's ministry, but one does not exist or lacks the resources for one.  Please consider supporting us, and feel free to have your men come check us out sometime.  
  • Please use the convenient Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Want to get in on the coolest thing since the advent of the craft beer movement?

We’re unlike anything you’ve ever seen. Every beer is a work of art. We’re dedicated to adventurous ingredients in palatable perfection.

We’re not just a brewery. Every beer we create represents a fully realized superhero character that revolves around our very own comic book universe, illustrated in stunning detail by comic artists.


We’re ready to roll out our flagship beers...

Solasta Kölsch                                        Dr. Enigma IPA

                                  



 Max Nix English Porter                           Death Blossom Red Rye

                                      

  


                                           Mind Trappe Belgian Dubbel

                                                     


But, we need your help to make our taproom the best in the universe!

Like most brewery projects we planned for the worst, and still came a bit under budget. Usually the first place where you can cut money out is a taproom. This is because its more important to be able to actually make the beer, than to have a place to enjoy the beer! The beer that can't be made because you spent so much on the place to enjoy it!

Our brewing equipment and construction alone, will reach a cost of around $700,000!

But don't worry, we have that covered!


Here's what we are asking of our community:

By helping us to make our taproom more affordable, you are guaranteeing a comfortable, exciting place to enjoy our great beers and events. We are talking, comic art, arcade machines, projectors and video screens, a small stage for live music and events, areas for table top gaming and private parties, the works! At the same time, you will be getting some pretty cool Heroic Aleworks gear and recognition.   

I mean who wouldn't want BEER FOR LIFE?!  FOR LIFE, PEOPLE!

We humbly ask you to help us achieve this goal, so that we may bring you an exceptional quality product, in an exceptionally fun and exciting atmosphere to enjoy it!

The Beer for Life perk is pretty darn cool, but our other perks are cool too!

Heroic Aleworks branded glassware, T-Shirts, stickers and the like!

A chance to actually become a super hero inspired beer with your likeness illustrated for the character!

VIP events and tastings!

And last but not least, secret perk that will be announced mid-campaign that you WILL NOT want to miss!

REFERRAL CONTEST:

We want to have as much exposure as possible for our brewery and our campaign. Therefore, we are going to run a referral contest throughout the entire period of the campaign. Those who refer the campaign to others using their IndieGoGo account will be tracked and anyone who refers over $1000 worth of contributions will be in the running for a FREE, Beer for Life card! All you have to do is refer $1000 worth of contributions AND have the most referrals over all and the Beer for Life card is yours!


Thanks for helping us become super!


RISKS AND CHALLENGES:
Starting a craft brewery is a fairly complicated endeavor. As anyone who has ever started a business knows, it requires quite a bit of capital up front, as well as a lot of paperwork, a flurry of legal issues and potential pitfalls. Add alcohol production and the government into the mix and you have recipe for a very bitter experience. And not in a good, IPA kind of way...

That fact is though, we have already crossed a lot of those hurdles. Heroic Aleworks will open this fall. The question here is whether or not we will be able to have a comfortable, exciting and engaging taproom for our customers to enjoy; as we have had to cut a lot of expenses just to get the brewery operational.

We want to build a community around our project and around our brewery. We believe that a community funded event will help us do just that. This is your brewery, and your community, lets share it together!

Video Credits:

Written, directed, shot and edited by Matt Doe - www.whenframesdrop.com

Produced by Heroic Aleworks and Kate Landis

Production Assistant - Andrew Meinecke

Bar Patron - Patrick Fellows

Emergency Broadcast Voice Over - Don Polaski - Henrico On the Air Radio Players
Sound Design & Mix - Vince Magno
"Heroic Aleworks Theme" - Written and Performed by: Tim Hoke
"Actionable" - Music: www.bensound.com
"Oppressive Gloom" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

story:
Has anyone ever handed you a laser-cut business card on something other than cardstock? Probably not, but if they have, you didn’t forget them. Help us buy a laser, and you can get a set of your very own unforgettable cards.

What Pseudonym Does

Pseudonym Laser Corp is a design and manufacturing service built around the possibilities laser-cutting and -etching offer...and believe us, there are a LOT of possibilities. We offer small-batch laser services larger manufacturers will not because we believe that these techniques should be more accessible to artists, hobbyists, garage inventors, and other folks who want only one of their design rather than one thousand. Additionally, we offer templates and design assistance to help you apply the creative potential of laser-cut media to your everyday life: business cards, family portraits, and artwork are just the tip of the laser-iceberg of things that can betransformed by these techniques instead of traditional printing or cutting.

As we've developed our own product lines and created artwork and home-goods, the lack of reliable, affordable equipment to produce our ideas has restricted our productive volume. Up to now, we have been using the laser cutter at our local makerspace, and the sheer volume of its use from other members (with just as much right to it as us) limits our scalability. Sharing the laser with 300 (or more) other members is noble and everything, but to continue creating at a steady pace and guarantee completion of our own projects, we need our own laser.Your pre-orders and contributions in this campaign will fund the purchase of an Epilog Zing Laser which will allow us to make all the awesome perks...but we’ll describe those in a bit.

Where’s the Money Going?

Here’s a chart:

Pretty simple, right? Essentially, this campaign is JUST to fund the laser cutter.

Perks

So what do YOU get out of it? You’ll be the first to get some pretty sweet stuff made with the same laser cutter you help us purchase, you could get the chance to see the laser at work making your own set of business cards, or you could get an exclusive workshop with Pseudonym’s owners, Shea and Solomon, on how to design for a laser cutter.

Here’s a better breakdown of what you could get:

$10 - Token of Appreciation

As a token of thanks, we will send you a laser-cut token personally designed by the team!


$20 - Art Card

A formal Pseudonym thank-you note, postcard sized with laser-etched artwork on one side and our gratitude on the other!


$30 - Project Service Credit

$30 buys you $50 worth of design/fabrication credit on a future custom project of your choice (i.e. business cards, wedding invitations, personalized coasters, premium portrait etching)!


$40 - Queen-Inspired Jewelry

Choose from Queen of Hearts, Spades, Diamonds or Clubs-inspired acrylic necklace in gold/black, gold/blue, silver/black and black/matte gold on a 31", 24", 18" or 16" chain length OR etched laser band bracelet PLUS get a token of appreciation! Each comes with a matching set of earrings.


$50 - Awesome Rubber Wristband

Laser-cut rubber? Oh yeah! A black and red design to show the world just how awesome you are.

$50 - Intro Business Card Set

25 laser-etched single-sided standard size business cards with your logo and information (by your design or our templates) on attractive, durable cardstock material AND a token of appreciation!


$70 - Laser Cut Rubber Dog Collar

Laser cut rubber? Oh yeah! A black and red design to show the world just how awesome your pooch is.


$100 - Premium Business Card Set

30 laser-etched standard size business cards with your information and logo (by your design or our templates) on our premium materials.


$100 - 60 Intro Business Card Set

60 laser-etched single-sided standard size business cards with your logo and information (by your design or our templates) on attractive, durable cardstock material AND a thank-you token!


$100 - 4x6 Custom Photo Etching

Send us a picture (grayscale is best) and we will laser-etch it on a premium material of your choice in standard photo size PLUS a token of appreciation!


$100 - Custom Coaster Set


Send us six letters or symbols and we will custom-cut them into two- or three-tone 4" square or round wooden coasters varnished and sealed to be condensation-proof OR send us up to six pictures and we will laser-etch them onto a set of six 4" round or square two-tone, varnished and sealed coasters PLUS a token of appreciation!


$125 - Premium Business Card Set + Rubber Card Holder


30 laser-etched standard size business cards with your information and logo (by your design or our templates) on our premium materials PLUS an etched rubber card holder.


$125 - 5x7 Custom Photo Etching

Send us a picture (grayscale is best) and we will laser-etch it on 5"x7" premium material of your choice PLUS a token of appreciation!


$175 - 60 Premium Business Card Set

60 laser-etched standard size business cards with your information and logo (by your design or our templates) on our premium materials AND a thank-you art card!


$175 - Large Wall Art


Choose a four-color wood-cut portrait of the King, Queen, or Jack of Hearts, Spades, Clubs or Diamonds 12"x18" without "card border," (available in white background, black background, red background or yellow background) OR a custom hi-res image of your choice. Each is suitable for framing, is varnished and sealed to protect from most environmental factors, and signed (and numbered) by the artist PLUS a thank-you art card!


$200 - Animals Getting Carried Away


Limited run of one of four 12"x18"ish wooden zoo animal (your choice of ostrich, zebra, giraffe or panda) suspended by acrylic balloons (total wallspace at your discretion) and signed (and numbered) by the artist PLUS a thank-you art card!

Please add $10 for international shipping if outside the US.


$250 - Fire the Laser! Premium Cards

Activate the laser yourself (yes, come over and push the button!) to cut and etch a set of 60 premium business cards and watch the magic happen while enjoying tea or coffee with founders Solomon and Shea! (Refreshments provided; travel and incidentals to North Chicago not included)


$250 - Exclusive Laser Cutter Design Workshop Seat

Ever wonder what it takes to design projects for a laser cutter? Let Pseudonym’s founders, Shea and Solomon, show you with a hands-on workshop! (Refreshments provided; travel and incidentals to North Chicago not included)


$600 - Full-Size King, Queen, or Jack


Choose a red/gold or white/black background for the King, Queen, or Jack of Hearts, Clubs, Diamonds or Spades. A 18" x 24" stylized representation of the traditional playing card in four colors, contrasting top and bottom. Comes with fitted corner-mounts to be oriented in any direction but also suitable for framing. Varnished and sealed to resist most environmental factors, PLUS a thank-you art card!


$2000 - Set of Four Full-Size Face Cards

Your choice of four face card wall hangings. Choose a red/gold or white/black background for the King, Queen, or Jack of Hearts, Clubs, Diamonds or Spades. A stylized representation of the traditional playing card in four colors, contrasting top and bottom. Comes with fitted corner-mounts to be oriented in any direction but also suitable for framing. Varnished and sealed to resist most environmental factors, PLUS a thank-you art card!

Premium Materials

Our premium cards will be made with some interesting materials. Choose one of the following to stand out from the masses:

  • Wood

  • Cork

  • Acrylic

  • Rubber

  • Leather

Risks, Challenges, and Timeline

Not everything is as simple as it sounds, and sometimes setbacks and problems happen. Here’s what we’re expecting could go wrong and what we’re doing to make those things not happen:


Shipping Over Budget

Many a crowdfunding campaign has run into not accounting for the actual costs of shipping. What happens when you run out of money, but you still need to fulfill perks? Er...we’d rather not let that happen. Instead, we’re budgeting for shipping by wrapping those costs (priced at USPS’s prepaid flat rate boxes and envelopes) in with the costs of your perks. If you want your perk shipped outside of the US, we ask that you add an additional amount (listed on the perk description) for the additional cost.


Delays in Getting the Laser Cutter

The process of acquiring a laser cutter involves considerable time. Each machine is made to order and build/shipping times are nonspecific. It could take several weeks depending on the manufacturer’s volume and other factors, but once we have it operational, orders can be fulfilled immediately. Really, there’s no way around this. If there are delays, the best we can do is update all the kind and generous folks that have contributed to our campaign (AKA you) that it’s going to take a little longer than we might have expected...so that’s what we’ll do. Also, given that some of the perks have delicate, handmade features, some orders may take longer to fulfill, but we will be as open as we can about our progress (without being spammy).


As long as everything goes according to plan, we should start shipping perks at the beginning of May 2015.

We appreciate your help!

Thanks for all of your contributions and support!


Please consider sharing our campaign with your friends via the social medium of your choice. That would be awesome of you!

story:
Celebrate Our State - FUN FOR SALE!

Good things come to those who Celebrate Our State!  We have set out to create something of great value for absolutely everyone who gets involved with Celebrate Our State. www.celebrateourstate.com  This Michigan only initiative will make an enormous impact on the communities that engage with us.  We have big goals!  We need your help!  

We are raising money in order to expand our endeavor of creating a membership and brand in Michigan that will support the best local businesses.  We are depending on contributors in order to do many things expediently, to give Celebrate Our State a legitimate chance to succeed.  As this campaign begins, our directory contains approximately 30 participating businesses. With your help, we plan to more than triple that number, surpassing 100 in summer 2015.

With a Celebrate Our State membership, you may visit our quality participating businesses and save money every time you visit with your membership card.  We are creating a way to connect consumers with unique, quality local businesses, many that they may not otherwise know about. 

When we succeed:

  • As a member, you will save money at many of your and our favorite places in Michigan. 
  • As a member, you can save time researching cool new venues to visit.  We are doing it for you!   
  • The most unique, quality local businesses will prosper with increase exposure and more customers. 
  • Local economies will strengthen.  
  • Local First, a non-profit supporter of local commerce, will receive 10% off all  Celebrate Our State membership fees.
  • Michigan will further expand its status as a travel destination!   

What We Need & What You Get

We need your contributions in order to expand the Celebrate Our State membership to a vast number of unique establishments in many towns in Michigan.  Specifically, this is going to take a substantial amount of our time to accomplish, and the funds necessary for growth will be vital. By receiving ample campaign donations, we will be enabled to increase the value of the membership rapidly.   

  • We have a goal of raising $25,000, and see this number as boosting our efforts for 2015.  First, we will expand our team. By bringing someone on board we will be able to invite and add more businesses to our directory, faster (budget $6-9k). We need to upgrade our website and will have multiple technological expenses such as app development, in addition to material expenses for things like high quality membership cards, t-shirts and other branded merchandise (budget $7-10k). There will be travel expenses with visiting potential businesses and visiting current partners to make sure we are creating mutual value between consumers and businesses (budget $4-6k). Marketing is always an area where many dollars should be spent when the budget permits, such as social media boosting, radio advertising, web advertising, and other creative means of spreading the word about Celebrate Our State like grassroots methods of passing out flyers like we already do (budget $6-9k).  
  • Our perks are incredible.  Say hello to the next most recognizable Michigan-centric brand to date.  Donate now for incredible value! 

                   

  • If the entire goal is not reached, any funds that are raised by the campaign will be used in the leanest possible manner to achieve as many of the initiatives above. The core initiative is attracting more businesses to our directory so that the value translates into more memberships. Therefore funds will be used first and foremost to expand the team in efforts to invite and add more business to our directory faster and to improve on the technological side, making processes as user friendly as possible.   

The Impact

Michigan has much to offer to not only its residents, but to anyone who visits.

This is going to be awesome for our state and for our communities.  Many local economies have been recovering beautifully over the last several years and we want to see this trend continue.  We have developed a way to support this trend by creating a directory to connect consumers with really cool unique businesses in the niches of entertainment, eating, drinking and shopping. 

Risks & Challenges

We need your contributions in order to expand the Celebrate Our State membership to a vast number of businesses in many towns in Michigan.  We are risking a significant amount of time, money and energy to accomplish our goal of a state wide initiative that includes unique businesses in your favorite town(s). There are three main risks in this business model. The first is that we are not able to provide a minimally viable product due to businesses not participating. If that were to happen then we face the risk of people not buying the membership due to lack of value. Competition is the other risk, which is true with most businesses, so the speed at which we can accomplish our mission is crucial. Most of the challenges lie within technology and manpower. We need to have a great website, one that is user friendly and easy on the eyes. We also need a team in place to operate the business in all facets just mentioned.   

  • Challenge 1: we provide the directory listing for free to our partner businesses. There is typically not a good reason for one not to participate. So far, we are at over a 90% success rate on new businesses joining us when invited and are getting some organically joining us through our website enroll page.
  • Challenge 2: we have had sales and free trials so we know that there is interest and value already, and we will increase that value. 
  • Challenge 3: we are ahead of anyone trying to compete, but we need to act fast with any funds we have to stay ahead of competition, as there will most likely be some, especially when our model proves itself as well as we believe it will.
  • Plan for solving these challenges: we are working with people that are gifted in the area of technology and plans are in place for an upgraded website. If we have the funds to bring on another team member to invite and add more businesses to our directory, then it frees more of our time to make sure every facet of the business is running smoothly and efficiently and expedites our goal of reaching hundreds, possibly thousands of businesses, providing an unheard of value to our members.

Other Ways You Can Help

Wether or not you are able to contribute and collect some of the amazing perks, we would love for you to advocate for us further.  Please help us succeed:

  • Send emails to the people in your network with a link to our campaign.
  • Share our campaign with your friends through social media outlets.
  • Suggest your favorite businesses that you think should be added to our directory.  
  • Request friends on Facebook and Twitter to follow our page.
  • Tell everyone you know.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Good things come to those who Celebrate Our State.  HERE'S TO YOU, MICHIGAN!


About Us: 

  • Quinten Kelley, upon earning his MBA, developed numerous websites in medical, retail, and financial businesses and is an entrepreneur with a heart for local businesses.  Todd Haulenbeek, upon graduating from Hope College, taught in a school in Mexico as a missionary with his wife. Upon returning, he worked as a youth pastor, mastering the art of networking and mentoring. He then pursued starting his own successful business which he has run for several years.

Current List of participating businesses at celebrateourstate.com:


DRINKS

ONE WELL BREWING COMPANY - KALAMAZOO

$1 off first beer. Every visit

RUPERT'S BREW HOUSE - KALAMAZOO

$1 off first beer.

LEMONJELLO'S COFFEE- HOLLAND

$1 off one beverage per visit. $1 off bag of coffee beans

BIG LAKE BREWING - HOLLAND

$1 off first beer.

OUR BREWING - HOLLAND

 $1 off first beer

TIBBS BREWING CO. - KALAMAZOO

$1 off first beer

GONZO'S BIGGDOGG BREWERY - KALAMAZOO

10% off merchandise

FLATLANDERS BARSTILLERY - GRAND RAPIDS

$1 off cocktails and 10% off food

PAW PAW BREWING CO. - PAW PAW

$1 off pints, $1 off food baskets, 10% off gear

COPPERCRAFT DISTILLERY - HOLLAND

10% off merchandise

GRAND TRAVERSE DISTILLERY - TRAVERSE CITY 

15% off merchandise



DINING

FLATLANDERS BARSTILLERY - GRAND RAPIDS

           $1 off cocktails, spirits and 10% off food

PAW PAW BREWING CO. - PAW PAW

$1 off pints, $1 off food baskets, 10% off gear

GONZO'S BIGGDOGG BREWERY - KALAMAZOO

10% off merchandise


ADVENTURE

PETOSKEYTODD.COM - MICHIGAN

25% off guided adventure

OUTDOOR BOOK CLUB - WEST MICHIGAN

Free book with booked trip.

COAST 3 - HOLLAND

First month membership is free


SPECIALTY RETAIL/FOOD

SERENE BODY ESSENTIALS - GR/ONLINE

15% off

BOXED GR - GRAND RAPIDS

15% off gift subscription

HILLTOP DESIGNS HD - MARTIN/ONLINE

20% off!

MICHIGAN MARKERS - KALAMAZOO/ONLINE

10% off!

THE STATION - KALAMAZOO

20% off one dancewear item or 3-month studio rental membership.

MICHIGAN PANTRY - HOLLAND

10% off

BLUEBERRY HAVEN - GRAND HAVEN

10% off

GOOD LIFE GRANOLA - HOLLAND/ONLINE 

15% off

MEMORIES BRIDAL & EVENING WEAR - K-ZOO

$50 off accessories with purchase of a bridal gown.  20% off accessories with purchase of evening gown.

 LA VIE EN ORANGE - KALAMAZOO/ONLINE

15% off handmade underwear that puts a party in your pants!

THE PLATE BOUTIQUE - GR, MOUNT PLEASANT

15% off


SERVICE/ENTERTAINMENT

URBAN MASSAGE - GRAND RAPIDS

10% off any massage

BROOK CAMERON L.M.T., H.H.P. - K-ZOO

$10 off Massage sessions

ROADBELLY MAGAZINE - GRAND RAPIDS

15% off 


LODGING

PRISCILLAS GIFT - GRAND HAVEN

15% off on your week's stay

Challenge 2: we have had sales and free trials so we know that there is interest and value already, and we will increase that value. 
Challenge 3: we are ahead of anyone trying to compete, but we need to act fast with any funds we have to stay ahead of competition, as there will most likely be some, especially when our model proves itself as well as we believe it will. Plan for solving these challenges: we are working with people that are gifted in the area of technology and plans are in place for an upgraded website. If we have the funds to bring on another team member to invite and add more businesses to our directory, then it frees more of our time to make sure every facet of the business is running smoothly and efficiently and expedites our goal of reaching hundreds, possibly thousands of businesses, providing an unheard of value to our members.    Other Ways You Can Help
Wether or not you are able to contribute and collect some of the amazing perks, we would love for you to advocate for us further.  Please help us succeed:  Send emails to the people in your network with a link to our campaign.
Share our campaign with your friends through social media outlets.
Suggest your favorite businesses that you think should be added to our directory.  
Request friends on Facebook and Twitter to follow our page.
Tell everyone you know.
Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Good things come to those who Celebrate Our State.  HERE'S TO YOU, MICHIGAN!


About Us: 
Quinten Kelley, upon earning his MBA, developed numerous websites in medical, retail, and financial businesses and is an entrepreneur with a heart for local businesses.  Todd Haulenbeek, upon graduating from Hope College, taught in a school in Mexico as a missionary with his wife. Upon returning, he worked as a youth pastor, mastering the art of networking and mentoring. He then pursued starting his own successful business which he has run for several years.

story:
With your help, 

we can unite the world.

Welcome on behalf of everyone at OurPangea! We bring to you a dynamic new approach to networking that will change the way local communities interact with each other. 


We are envisioning a new platform for Humanity to stand on, one that can be developed globally through technological collaboration between tribes around the world!

We as humans stand on the brink of a global renaissance, we can pull the resources together to rapidly improve the quality of life for all, we just need to get organized! 

That's where OurPangea comes in. 

This is our story.

This is our rebirth.



eQuality of life is our primary focus


Our 3-Step Plan


1) Offer a fully functional networking  platform to the world that is based around community building. Establish a digital global commons for collaboration between individuals, organizations, and communities alike.

2) Use this platform generate funds and resources that will allow us to engineer an ecologically sustainable future by investing into the projects that receive the most support via our own crowd sourced voting systems. 

3) Integrate and inspire through a new breed of fully sustainable festivals that will not only provide cutting edge experiences to all participants, but also host ambassadors from networks around the world who share break through developments and demonstrations of new practices. (::)

 


OurPangea evolves with us 

By focusing our resources on empowering our members, we will create a lasting symbiotic relationship with  We Pangeans, that will be fruitful for generations to come. As our network grows, so does your community, and so does your local crowd sourcing budget.

This platform is inspired by the open-source philosophy, our goal is to convert resources into progress. Imagine lush gardens and eventually even thriving communities worldwide that were all jumpstarted and paid for by the characterized rapid growth that we see in the corporate world when a good idea catches on. 

Well, a man once said, "Be the change"... and although it's probably been repeated in vain more times than anyone could care to count, here we are.. We can change the way corporations worldwide do business., by setting the standard for what good business REALLY is. 

OurPangea is a part of a new paradigm of organization altogether. All of our financial information will be openly available for all members to review and take pride in.

With OurPangea, you will have access to a globally sourced network of networks with a live data feed of relevant news, events, & ongoing conversations within the network that you are visiting.

You will also be able to easily find local businesses and skilled artisans in your area. Whether you are living with us in Austin, Texas -  Jerusalem, Israel - or just visiting in Seoul, Korea for the first time we will all be connected, and you will know what the OurPangea family recommends  as we create a map of conscious community collaboration around the globe. 

Our network reorganizes the internet experience as it is and makes it possible to travel to any corner of the planet where you'll find the story of the local community. You'll even be able to say hang out and chat with them! We are committed to pioneering  an entirely new territory of innovation, creating new uses of the internet to enhance the connectivity between members in new and exciting ways. With focus on technological development, we hope to create an open source community that gets projects sponsored and in production that put our community (and yours) on the map.

We aim to be fun. To continue incorporating new features that will enhance not only your connection to others, but your workflow as well. 

Did we mention it's ad-free and the data is shared openly?


We trust you'll build a world you want to live in and we will empower you with the technology and capital to do so.


OurPangea is the next generation of internet technology

This is the localized internet. OurPangea will help you connect with people in your area and even help you put freshly prepared food on the table while supporting people who are doing what they love. This is an ecosystem of exchange and will enable you to find the resources you need to survive, flourish, and grow. (::)

We believe in the power of the human mind to achieve infinite wonders. There are communities blooming around the world that will be thriving when technology like what we are creating reaches their finger tips. And you can help us get it to them! (::)


BETA v1.1 Invites are available for contributors 



With your help, anything is possible.

We have all learned that unity requires participation. We feel that people would participate given the right platform to interact with. This is the art of engineering a new society on a technological level. When we work together, anything is possible. For the first time humanity will be able to connect directly with each other and decide how to invest in our future. 

OurPangea will start as the global commons, an anonymous communication network. Everyone who participates will be asked to contribute $10/ month, which will be used to finance projects and infrastructure that helps community come together. Local farms, production equipment, innovative technologies, maker spaces, workshops, recycling plants, galleries, event venues, cultural centers, festivals and beyond. We are here to help build a sustainable future together. As soon as you enter OurPangea you will be given votes to decide which projects are brought to life. We have the technology.

Now, all we need is you. 

Your support will let us know we're on the right track and motivate us to keep on innovating!  
 

This campaign is just the beginning.


Any support is appreciated! Your love makes all the difference! 



Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to help financially but still would like to contribute,  invite people to join the discussion at  https://www.facebook.com/OurPangea
or share this page with your networks! 

Thanks from everyone at the OP!

We have the technology.Now, all we need is you.

story:
Childhood Obesity is a preventable epidemic in our country. Parents, families, teachers and friends can prevent a child from scars that will never fully go away and pain they will never forget. Nutrition and activity patterns develop early in childhood and children learn from what they are exposed to. For the first time in history we have a generation of Americans that are not expected to outlive their parents. Obesity is an Epidemic!   It’s time we all take responsibility, no more excuses. It’s time we all take true action and accountability to break free from the painful and intolerable prison that is Obesity.

Our Story

Danielle Girdano, a Certified Master Personal Trainer who received her Certification at the Prestigious Cooper Institute in Dallas, TX. Danielle is a motivational speaker and advocate for health and fitness, providing specialized education for Childhood Obesity as it was a great part of her personal life. 

Our goal is to raise awareness and support for Childhood and Adult Obesity. Danielle Girdano will begin an endurance bike ride across historic Route 66, starting in Chicago and ending in Los Angeles while bringing attention to the epidemic of childhood obesity in the US while attempting to break the current US and World record.

The Impact

Getting a project like this off the ground requires a great deal of planning, researching and resources!  Danielle and the Highway For Health team have done the research and planning, but need YOU'RE help with getting the resources.  "I know we can change lives!  I know WE can save lives! I KNOW, we can positively impact hundreds of thousands of kids and adults across the country, but we need your help to get started!" Danielle passionately explains!  

Every dollar raised will go directly to start up costs like logo design, website domain, website creation and printing of informational handouts!  "I have the drive and passion to change the world and you the unique opportunity to be a part of this life changing project!" Danielle adds "Every dollar counts". "Every dollar helps reach a child in need!"  Please donate today with $5 or $500, every donation is precious. 

Can't donate? Please share this campaign with others or volunteer at one of our upcoming events!  


CHILDHOOD OBESITY PREVENTION:

Prevention of childhood obesity starts in the early years, in the home with parents, family and childcare providers. An imperative for getting started early, is education! One simple step to assist in preventing childhood obesity and improve healthy eating in the home includes not purchasing processed foods, foods high in sugar content or GMO products. Our goal includes educating parents on understanding food labels, reading ingredients listed on packaging and avoiding the "dead aisles" of the grocery store when at all possible. There is a need for direct involvement in what a child eats wherever they are.  "Behavior patterns" are created when we as adults choose foods that will build the foundations for ongoing healthy eating patterns. Taste bud and eating habits develop early in a child and are hard to break after the age of 10. Involving your child in making dinner or choosing places to eat when on the go is very important. “Fast food” doesn't have to mean empty calories or lack of nutrition, many places like Panera, Whole Foods or Sweet Tomatoes have “fast food” options that allow you to keep your schedule on track and your child healthy! Parents are sewng the tone for their child's life in the early years which can prevent obesity and health concerns later in life. Children learn what their environment teaches them, what a parent does is overwhelmingly likely to be copied by the child, we must be the example. Being active and making physical activity a part of daily life is crucial. Children who are involved in  school sports or activities that require movement do better in school, have significantly lower levels of depression and higher self esteem with a sense of achievement. A great example of bringing both the nutrition and physical activity worlds together

story:
At Sweet Nectar Spa, our vision is to create a sophisticated, boutique Medi-Spa & Wellness studio for individuals who share our passion for excellence, effective treatments and giving back to our communities by making environmentally-conscience decisions and by empowering the lives of others! 

As a Licensed Medical Esthetician, and Owner of SNS, my goal is to provide our patients with a level of service and expertise that exceeds their expectations. Educating our patients with factual data to support both Medical & Wholistic approaches to enhancing the patients appearance and over-all, well-being. SNS treatments are innovative and effective, with a focus on results, rather than ineffective fads. We utilize the technology of science and the power of pure plant botanicals, providing even the most sensitive-skinned client an experience that enhances both their appearance and well-being. 

SNS is honored and privileged to partner with three amazing professional associates, to insure our patient's receive the highest care possible:

Michele Phelan, L.M.E., R.A.

-Executive Director at Concepts Institute of Advanced Esthetics (CIAE):

Writes & teaches core curriculum for the Clinical Esthetics program at CIAE

Writes for various publications such as, Skin Inc., Dermascope, Les Nouvelle Esthetiques, Skin Deep and Aromatherapy News Letter, interviewed by CBS for her extensive knowledge of skin care

-International CIDESCO Diplomat, Educator, Test Examiner

Dr. Bradley Greene, M.D.

-Board Certified Facial Plastic and Reconstructive Surgeon

-Active member of the American Academy of Facial Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery

-Medical Director at CIAE

Dr. James Romano, M.D.

-Board Certified Plastic Surgeon, Member of American Society Plastic Surgery, American Society of Aesthetic Plastic Surgery, American Society of Maxillofacial Surgeons

-Assistant Cheif of Service at The John Hopkins Hospital, Assistant Professor of Plastic Surgery at The University of Southern California

-Voted top Doctor: Honored by Castle Connolly's Top Doctor Award. Voted on by his peers, he has been part of this prestigous group for over ten years!! His training in top institutions along with ZERO malpractice cases, have propelled him to elite status within the plastic and cosmetic surgery fields.


Our Menu:

-Micro-needling for the Face or Body...Great for remodeling the skin!

-Micro-dermabrasion

-Chemical Peels & Enzymes

-LED and Ultrasound therapy

-Effective, Anti-Cellulite & Body Contouring Treatments

-Hyperpigmentation

-Bridal Make-up

-Special Occasion Styling with accesories from our unique collections

-Aromatherapy, Chakra Balancing, Essential Oils for Home & Health

-Supplements, antioxidants, detoxes...to optimize absorption of nutrients & over-all health...Nutrition Coaching, Identifying Body Type...and SO much more!

We invite you to join us on our journey to make the world a better place by enhancing the lives of others! Thank you for checking us out!

Blessings!

story:
This campaign has now finished.  You may now pay tribute via My new campaign site which is

igg.me/at/spoilholly



Let´s Go Caravanning Around Europe

Oh, I´m sorry. Did you think I was talking about you?! hehehe. Oh no.

I WILL be going, but I will be taking My Family with Me, not you!  You´re just going to pay for it!

You see, I´ve been thinking about how you could BEST serve Me.  And what better way, than to send Me on one lovely long European Road Trip with My beautiful Children. And then I thought, No. Wait! There IS a better way. YOU can BUY ME a new campervan.

That´s right. You pathetic little losers are going to tribute your hard earned cash, so that I can enjoy My free time in luxury with My Children this Summer.  You can´t come with Me. You can´t meet Me on My travels. Because you´re not worthy. You are nothing more than an open wallet to Me. And whilst I am sunning Myself on the Italian Riviera, taking in a bit of culture in Prague, or entertaining the children at the seaside, you´ll be thinking of how you contributed to My Happiness. Because My Happiness is the ONLY thing that is important here.

You are nothing more than a pathetic excuse for a human being; ruled by what can only be described as a diseased maggot between your legs. The needs of viruses come above yours. That is how low you are. And the only way to make yourself feel ANYTHING positive in your life, is to submit and to pay tribute to Me; to Worship Me; to Spoil Me; to Adore Me.

I want every spare penny you have, and more, every payday until you´ve given Me enough to buy My new campervan.

I am Mistress Harsh Holly, and you will feel eternally blessed to serve Me.
story_txt: This campaign has now finished.  You may now pay tribute via My new campaign site which isigg.me/at/spoilhollyLet´s Go Caravanning Around EuropeOh, I´m sorry. Did you think I was talking about you?! hehehe. Oh no.I WILL be going, but I will be taking My Family with Me, not you!  You´re just going to pay for it!You see, I´ve been thinking about how you could BEST serve Me.  And what better way, than to send Me on one lovely long European Road Trip with My beautiful Children. And then I thought, No. Wait! There IS a better way. YOU can BUY ME a new campervan.That´s right. You pathetic little losers are going to tribute your hard earned cash, so that I can enjoy My free time in luxury with My Children this Summer.  You can´t come with Me. You can´t meet Me on My travels. Because you´re not worthy. You are nothing more than an open wallet to Me. And whilst I am sunning Myself on the Italian Riviera, taking in a bit of culture in Prague, or entertaining the children at the seaside, you´ll be thinking of how you contributed to My Happiness. Because My Happiness is the ONLY thing that is important here.You are nothing more than a pathetic excuse for a human being; ruled by what can only be described as a diseased maggot between your legs. The needs of viruses come above yours. That is how low you are. And the only way to make yourself feel ANYTHING positive in your life, is to submit and to pay tribute to Me; to Worship Me; to Spoil Me; to Adore Me.I want every spare penny you have, and more, every payday until you´ve given Me enough to buy My new campervan.I am Mistress Harsh Holly, and you will feel eternally blessed to serve Me.

story:
Short Summary

  • Located in New York City, TikiMan Store is a designer, manufacturer, and retailer of custom embroidered apparel and wood accessories.  Serving individuals and companies alike, TikiMan Store is most recognized for its fraternity and sorority products.
  • We've obtained a unique location that will give you all the store you've wanted as well as a lounge that will include TV's, games, Wi-Fi, snacks and regularly scheduled fun-filled events.
  • Your contribution will help bring a one-of-a kind experience to life.  Ever been to a retail store with a lounge?  Here's your chance.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $15,000 to decorate our new store and lounge so that it will be a destination you'll never want to leave.  We want you to make our space your new home away from home.  
  • Become a part of our "Wall of Fame" by purchasing an engraved wood brick ($50) and/or have your picture hung in our lounge ($100).

  • Even if we don't reach our goal of $15,000, your contribution is still extremely beneficial to us.  We will use the funds to obtain the following items in the order they are listed:  Display Cases, Clothing Racks, Inventory, Couches/Lounge Chairs, Coffee Tables, TV's, and Popcorn Machine.

The Impact

This is your opportunity to be a part of something cool before it reaches the pinnacle of cool.  Not only will this be a staple in the local community but also amongst the collegiate and young professional communities alike.  With your contribution you will make history by co-creating an unprecedented experience with our multi-use space.

Risks & Challenges

Our lounge is the heart and soul of our new location and without adequate funding we will not be able to create the space we've envisioned for you.

  • We're prepared to scour craigslist for alternative decorations for the lounge if necessary.  

Other Ways You Can Help

  • No cash? No problem!  You can help by spreading the word via e-mail, social media or even phone a friend.  
  • You can also help by donating cool stuff to decorate the lounge with such as gently used furniture, TV's, Sound Systems, Games, and Paint.

story:
I am Nathan Hart and the founder of World trust housing project.

My skills encompass the building trade,carpentry,joinery and furniture design.

I am based in Framlingham, Suffolk and my new company will design and build sustainable code 4-5 homes (Eco dynamic homes)

My project is different - It is about building homes for first time buyers and families starting out on the property ladder and will enable them to begin with at least 15% equity in each home.

 People should come before profit.!

I am planning to sell my Eco homes for (current market) semi detached £185,000 & Terrace homes ranging between £125,000 - £135,000. A lot less than conventional developers will charge. The only stipulation is that buyers will not be able to sell for three years-This is a partnership to build a community,not a quick profit!


How will i do this? Because i am passionate about the environment and about people. I will provide work for local skilled craftsman and provide homes for local people.

 What will these Eco dynamic homes look like?


1) The design of the building of which I have already drawn has a very simple construction made from timber frame (i- joist ) construction creating 400mm cavities filled with cellulose fibre ( pulped news paper). The finish on the outside will be that of horizontal larch boarding and the windows are double and triple glazed with aluminium frames.The roof is finished off with a zinc trim all round inc gutters. Inside part of the walls are finished in panelled birch ply. ( new owner to stain what ever colour they want or leave natural) the floors in the kitchen, dining lounge are finished with polished concrete and either laminate or carpeted bedrooms/office.

2) My company will make a profit of around 10% and after expenses will plough that profit back into research and development.

3) 50 % of all constructions will use self employed carpenters local to where ever the building site is. Thus not creating large overheads with having full time staff but in the process helping the local community. I intend to start locally but my business model means i can pretty much build anywhere around the world.  Well .. as long as it's not up Everest! 


Finance? High street financial institutions are restricted by their lending rules and are reluctant to fund a project driven by community and sustainability rather than profits and dividends. 

 I heard of crowd funding a couple of months ago and hoped and am turning to like minded people to support this Eco-cause.

I call this project " living for the future!" ..

 Help me realise that future. It's also good for the environment.

Included in the construction of the 84 m2 2 bed semi detached bungalow. Is an office that doubles up as a nursery. An open plan lounge diner, family bathroom and a good sized kitchen with small larder. 

Included in the 46m2 terrace houses are a double bedroom with built in wardrobe, single bedroom/office/nursery, a good sized bathroom,small utility(pantry) and an open plan lounge diner and kitchen. 


 The sustainables are..

 Heating

 Underfloor heating powered by a 14 kW pellet burning ( 3kw to air 11 kW to water) stove that will switch on and off according to what ever temp has been set. ( burning on full 3 kg of pellets per hr) The house is super insulated so full power would never have to be used.  

Photovoltaic 

I will use as standard a 5 kW photovoltaic solar cell on grid system on the sedum roof, thus generating power for free to your home. Sedum roof apart from a great insulator helps cleans the air of co2.  

Timber will all be FSC grade ( forest stewardship council ) Replace what has been taken out of the earth.  

Over site will be formed using Eco crete on a compacted oversite using polystyrene formers. This system does away with footings meaning over 60 % less concrete is used. 

Also there will be a shared rainwater harvester. This will be used for the running of toilets and washing machines 



What if my target is not met?

I require £495,000 to turn this project into reality- buying land for two intial Eco dynamic properties.

If my target is not met then what money is raised will still be used to develop my plans in more detail for them to be used for an energy assessment and full structural drawings for building regulations.  

My dream will not die!

If you have any questions please contact me via the comments box. 

Many thanks for your time in reading about my project.

 Kindest regards 

Nathan
