story:
The story so far...

Being electronics enthusiasts, we've been using micro-controllers for most of our adult life and we've always felt the need for more: more speed, more capabilities, easier programming & debugging to name a few.

Apart from micro-controllers, we've also used Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) and though these are really neat by themselves, they are not very easy for everyone to use. You need to learn difficult programming languages called HDLs. Also, FPGAs don't contain micro-controllers, are purely digital in nature and hence you cannot directly interface analog signals.

ENTER zeeSoC 


The zeeSoC is a cross between a micro-controller, FPGA and precision analog chips. It contains a 80MHz ARM Cortex-M3 core with precision analog and digital fabric. This enables you to design your hardware with software. The development environment is not only intuitive, but allows you to graphically program your chip, which enables you to design more and iterate less. Simply drag and drop any of the existing 100+ peripherals (or create your own), graphically configure it, assign the pins to any of the hardware pins and you are well on your way to make some magic.

The zeeSoC features on-chip debugging which lets you view the state of the system while it executes your code. No need for serial print commands, you can rapidly analyze the system and fix bugs in no time. All this enables you to emulate hardware: that's right, you can emulate commercial chips within the zeeSoC and you end up with a truly custom System-on-a-Chip solution which does exactly what you want it to do.

Help us build the zeeSoC community. Read further for more information and back us today.

With the zeeSoC you can!

Quick Specs:

  • Device Chip:             CY8C5888AXI-LP096
  • Core:                          ARM Cortex-M3
  • Clock Frequency:    DC to 80MHz
  • Power Supply:         USB or external DC (7.5V – 16V)
  • Current:                    2uA sleep mode/ 300nA in hibernate mode
  • FLASH:                      256KB
  • RAM:                         64KB
  • EEPROM:                  2KB
  • Dimensions:             51.7x67.4mm

Watch the following video to blink LEDs in less than 4 minutes from first plugging-in the zeeSoC

More resources at www.zeeSoC.com/resources.html


The zeeSoC is in a league of its own, here’s why:

1.  Faster, Powerful Hardware:

The zeeSoC consists of a 32-bit ARM Cortex-M3 CPU clocked at 80MHz which can deliver 100 DMIPS. It also features a programmable nested vectored interrupt controller (NVIC) with 256KB of FLASH, 64KB SRAM, 2KB EEPROM and contains 24 DMA channels to free the processor which in turn enables data transfer at unparalleled speeds.

2.  Debug Like A Pro With on-chip Debugging:

The zeeSoC can pause program execution and let you view the state of the system, enabling you to check exact values of memory registers, variables, peripheral buffers etc, thus giving you all the information you need to analyze and debug your system without having to resort to tradition Serial.println() statements which do not give you an exact overview of the state of the system, are very time consuming and inefficient to say the least.

3.  Design More, Iterate Less With Graphical Programming:

The zeeSoC makes use of the Cypress Semiconductor’s PSoC creator which lets you graphically configure any of the over 100 existing peripherals ranging from digital logic gates, analog/digital components, communication interfaces etc.

This enables you to scale quickly, make design changes rapidly, without having to read endless datasheets.

The zeeSoC is perfect even if you are just starting out. Don’t believe us? Check out the demos/tutorials on www.zeeSoC.com to learn more.

4.  Any Pin, Any Function:

Free yourself from fixed function micro-controllers. Why should the serial port be limited to only pin 2/3 when you can have a much better design if it were on pin 17/18 or 23/29? With the zeeSoC you can!

Each of the peripherals can be connected to any pin on the device, GRAPHICALLY. Making it even simpler. Just select the pin you want to map it do, re-build your project and Voila!

5.  Emulate Hardware And Make Your Own System-on-a-Chip (SoC):

This is where the zeeSoC really takes it home! Using graphical programming, flexible pin mapping capabilities and existing peripherals you can easily emulate existing chips and create your own System-on-a-Chip, which does exactly what you want it to do and nothing more. This not only reduces your BOM and saves valuable PCB area, it lets you have a custom solution for whatever you intend to design.

6.  Add  Touch With in-built Capsense:

Why add mechanical switches to your product when you can easily have a touch interface? The zeeSoC has inbuilt capsense which lets you add sliders, buttons, proximity switches to your product without additional hardware or intricacies.

7.  Hobby Meets Professionalism:

zeeSoC is arduino shield compatible. Just stack your existing shield on-top, graphically create your project and watch it work: hassle-free! No need to buy propriety shields, re-use your existing electronics and take them further with the zeeSoC.

Just like arduino, the zeeSoC supports open source hardware. Design files and revisions are maintained at www.github.com/frenoy-osburn/zeeSoC

Technical Specifications:
Digital:
  • 24 Universal Digital Blocks (UDB): USARTs, SPI etc.
  • Dedicated Digital Filter block: FIR & IIR filters
  • Timer/Counter/PWM blocks: 16-bit dedicated modules
  • Full-speed USB 2.0: up to 12Mbps
  • CAN/I2C: up to 1Mbps
Analog:
  • Delta-Sigma ADC: (8 - 20bits@384ksps - 187sps)
  • SAR ADC: 2x12-bit @ 1Msps
  • 4x Comparators
  • 4x Op-amps
  • Programmable Analog Blocks: PGAs, TIAs sample & hold circuits
  • Capsense: Touch interfaces
  • Internal Voltage Reference: 1.024V 0.1%
General:
  • GPIOs: 62 general purpose I/Os
  • DMA
  • Real-Time clock
  • Special I/O: 8 pins for high current applications

FAQs

1. Ordering multiple perks?

If the total order value is less than $150:

Add $10 for international shipment other than USA.

If order value is above $150: 

Add $10 for USA

Add $15 for remaining countries

2. Can I pay through PayPal?

We recommend you process your order through Indiegogo, but if you would like to use Paypal, please send us a message and we will send you an invoice. You can reach out to us through a comment on Indiegogo or leave us a message at www.zeeSoC.com/contact.html

story:
Short Summary

Let's swim with the sharks! My goal is to use the power of crowd funding to form an entity that leverages our investments into bargaining power to get better deals with early-stage companies. This cooperative effort allows us to become legitimate venture capitalist with an opportunity to gain the potential upside without risking more than a modest investment. Here how it works:

  • I am a CPA, JD with over 30 years of business experience advising small start-up entities and Fortune 500 companies alike. I will use that knowledge and experience to perform due diligence reviews of potential investments listed on AngelList.com. When I find a firm that I think has the potential to grow significantly and produce an outstanding return, I  will form a syndicate to solicit funds to invest in the company.
  • Forming the syndicate will pool capital and allow larger investments than an individual person will be able to make on his or her own. Thus, the syndicate would be expected to negotiate a better pricing for the investment and enhance the potential return for the syndicate and its members.
  • By banning together and funding the syndicate organization we will be leveraging the crowdfunding model into a greater venture capital funding model. The goal is to get in on the ground floor of the next Facebook without being a multimillionaire. If you are a multimillionaire then the potential for even greater leverage exists.

Excited? Let's use what today's technology and social networking has done for social expression and freedom to economically empower us to be part of the next juggernaut.

What We Need & What You Get

Here's a break down in more detail:

  • I am seeking $50K to organize and fund the investment structure. I will use as much self-help as possible to minimize the cost to organize the syndicate vehicle. The majority of the funds will be used  as the syndicate general partner's investment in portfolio companies.  This investment will be made in conjunction with members of the syndicate. Raising $50K would likely support investment in five portfolio companies by the syndicate general partner. 
  • Each syndicate is limited to 99 investors and would likely seek to raise between $500k to $1M. In some cases smaller raises would be sought for very early-stage companies.
  • As a contributor to my campaign, at the $100 or more level, you will be given "First Right of Refusal" on our initial investments.  This means you would be on the ground floor of any investing by the syndicate!
  • If the entire amount of $50K is not reached, then the plan is to scale down the investment goal to match whatever is raised. And of course, Indiegogo will charge a fee of 9% if we do not reach our goal. So if you do contribute, be sure to tell your friends to contribute to enhance the chances that the goal is reached. If more is raised than requested we will expand the syndicate's investment activities.

The Impact

If successful we will have laid the foundation for the creation of a grassroots venture funding vehicle that may incubate future millionaires that will be connected to you. This network of investors could change the investment landscape for generations to come.

    Risks & Challenges

    Let's be honest. No matter how much due diligence is performed on a company or how promising its future, it could end up bankrupt. That is the risk of venture financing, It is also the reason its rewards can be very lucative. With some skill and luck our syndicate will be able to identify some winners that will payoff significantly. That is the challenge that we can try to conquer together by:

    • Applying sound valuation methods and understanding the business models
    • Getting to know management and their capabilities
    • Using our knowledge and experience to make common sense decisions.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you are unable to contribute you can still help:

    • Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign!
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools to magnify your voice!

    Thank you for taking the time to learn about the campaign and I hope you will join us on this extraordinary adventure.
story_txt:
Short Summary Let's swim with the sharks! My goal is to use the power of crowd funding to form an entity that leverages our investments into bargaining power to get better deals with early-stage companies. This cooperative effort allows us to become legitimate venture capitalist with an opportunity to gain the potential upside without risking more than a modest investment. Here how it works:  I am a CPA, JD with over 30 years of business experience advising small start-up entities and Fortune 500 companies alike. I will use that knowledge and experience to perform due diligence reviews of potential investments listed on AngelList.com. When I find a firm that I think has the potential to grow significantly and produce an outstanding return, I  will form a syndicate to solicit funds to invest in the company. 

Forming the syndicate will pool capital and allow larger investments than an individual person will be able to make on his or her own. Thus, the syndicate would be expected to negotiate a better pricing for the investment and enhance the potential return for the syndicate and its members. By banning together and funding the syndicate organization we will be leveraging the crowdfunding model into a greater venture capital funding model. The goal is to get in on the ground floor of the next Facebook without being a multimillionaire. If you are a multimillionaire then the potential for even greater leverage exists. 
  Excited? Let's use what today's technology and social networking has done for social expression and freedom to economically empower us to be part of the next juggernaut.   What We Need & What You Get Here's a break down in more detail:  I am seeking $50K to organize and fund the investment structure. I will use as much self-help as possible to minimize the cost to organize the syndicate vehicle. The majority of the funds will be used  as the syndicate general partner's investment in portfolio companies.  This investment will be made in conjunction with members of the syndicate. Raising $50K would likely support investment in five portfolio companies by the syndicate general partner. 
Each syndicate is limited to 99 investors and would likely seek to raise between $500k to $1M. In some cases smaller raises would be sought for very early-stage companies.
 As a contributor to my campaign, at the $100 or more level, you will be given "First Right of Refusal" on our initial investments.  This means you would be on the ground floor of any investing by the syndicate! If the entire amount of $50K is not reached, then the plan is to scale down the investment goal to match whatever is raised. And of course, Indiegogo will charge a fee of 9% if we do not reach our goal. So if you do contribute, be sure to tell your friends to contribute to enhance the chances that the goal is reached. If more is raised than requested we will expand the syndicate's investment activities.    The Impact If successful we will have laid the foundation for the creation of a grassroots venture funding vehicle that may incubate future millionaires that will be connected to you. This network of investors could change the investment landscape for generations to come.    Risks & Challenges Let's be honest. No matter how much due diligence is performed on a company or how promising its future, it could end up bankrupt. That is the risk of venture financing, It is also the reason its rewards can be very lucative. With some skill and luck our syndicate will be able to identify some winners that will payoff significantly. That is the challenge that we can try to conquer together by: 
Applying sound valuation methods and understanding the business models
Getting to know management and their capabilities
Using our knowledge and experience to make common sense decisions.    Other Ways You Can Help If you are unable to contribute you can still help:  Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign! Use the Indiegogo share tools to magnify your voice!   Thank you for taking the time to learn about the campaign and I hope you will join us on this extraordinary adventure.

story:
ionicWell™ LLC

Sustainable - Lifestyle - Performance - Alternatives™

ionicWell™ LLC vision is to provide a well rounded approach to a wellness center; combining the arts, athletics, horticulture and natural healing therapy to help focus on a wellness that starts within!       

  

The Vision

Imagine all of these activities and places....

          
    

     

                           IN

  ionicWell™ LLC Wellness Center (iWC)

          


 ionicWell™ LLC will create Mobile Apps that are grounded in natural wellness information, practices and products. Each App will be dedicated to an aspect of life. For example:  food, exercise, posture.


The launching of  ionicWell™ LLC brand products. A variety of these products will be exclusively offered to those who contribute monetarily to the campaign depending on how much you decide to contribute. The products offered will consist of: Hemp sprout or milk bags, Hemp growing bags, Bamboo Therapy Roller, Hemp belt, neckless, wallets, cell phone cases, purses, side bags and more. You can check them out for more details on the side panel of this page. 

Hemp Sprout or Nut Milk bag (10"x12")

100% Hemp Linen stitched with Egyptian Cotton

This bag can be used to sprout seeds, or strain blended nut milks! Washable and Reusable.

 Hemp Planter Bag

100% Hemp Canvas stitched with Egyptian Cotton Planting bags made for indoor or outdoor growing.

Bamboo Therapy Roller

The Bamboo Therapy Roller is a 2" in diameter by 6" length piece of bamboo. The Bamboo Therapy Roller can be used by roller the bottom of the foot back and forth, releasing tension in the foot, helping relax the rest of the body. It can also be used in  other places of tension through out the body.


Hemp Belt

100% Hemp Material stitched with Egyptian Cotton

Hemp Bracelet 

100% Hemp Material stitched with Egyptian Cotton with wood button. 



Grounding Neckless 

A Tourmaline stone wrapped in sterling silver plated wire on hemp twine, covered in  Beeswax for comfort.

Tourmaline is known for its energetic and grounding properties. 
Read more on :http://www.crystalvaults.com/crystal-encyclopedia/black-tourmalin


Hemp Wallet/ Businesscard Holder

100% Hemp Canvas and Egyptian Cotton stitching. Fold open traditional wallet or business card Holder.

Hemp Cell Phone Slip Case

100% Hemp Canvas  and Egyptian Cotton stitched Cell Phone Slip Case.

Hemp Combo Wallet + Cell Phone Case

100% Hemp Canvas with Egyptian Cotton stitching 

-Slip space for cell phone

-7 card holder slips

-Wallet opening for money,checks, receipts,etc. 

Hemp Combo Hat (Fedora + Bucket)

100% Hemp Canvas with Egyptian Cotton Stitching. This hat can be rocked as a Fedora or Bucket hat depending on the mood.  


Hemp Purse

100% Hemp Canvas with Egyptian Cotton Stitching and 2 wood buttons. This bag has 3 Pockets, one outside pocket with a wood button and 2 inside pocket for optimal space and natural feel.

Hemp Side Bag

100% Hemp Canvas with Egyptian Cotton Stitching and Bamboo Detail. This bag has Hemp Denim cover, detailed with Bamboo to provide a solid and natural feel.


A full circled wellness center combining arts, athletics, horticulture and natural healing therapies.  

  ionicWell™ LLC Wellness Center (iWC)

From my experiences natural healing orientated businesses online and brick and mortar are much needed in our communities today. In my life, I have, and still do struggle with balance issues when it comes to  substances, foods and drinks. Like many others out there, I know it takes support, strength, flexibility, and endurance to keep balanced in what we put in our bodies. This is why I decided to dedicate my life journey to learn about natural wellness and share what I learn. 

   


 Contribution

Today I am asking you to contribute in anyway you can to support the start up of ionicWell™ LLC. It doesn’t have to be a monetary contribution, simply liking and sharing this video with friends and family helps out just the same!

 ionicWell™ LLC campaign goal is 5,000$ to start up the company and begin phases 1. The money will be used to purchase hardware, software, legal advice, advertising, marketing, and product materials. This being said, the more support the sooner an  ionicWell™ LLC Wellness Center will be in a neighborhood near you!



 

Owner/Founder Bio

My name is Raymond Murdock, I am the owner and founder of  ionicWell™ LLC.
I was born and raised in Phoenix, Arizona. I spent my undergrad years at the University of San Diego studying Sociology and playing on the Mens NCAA basketball team.  After graduating from USD I transferred to Hawaii Pacific University in Oahu, Hawaii where I studied for a Masters in Global Leadership and Sustainable Development, along with playing on the Mens NCAA basketball teams.  In Hawaii is where I made some significant lifestyle changes. During this transformation I became much more aware of a sense of wellness through nature, moving and healthy food and drink. In Hawaii is where my passion for wellness began.      

 


Closing Remarks

With the steady advancements in computer and information technology I feel it is important to not forget the power of nature and the divine technology of the human body. It is essential to bring information full circle into practice,

connecting with the wellness within.  With your contribution I can help provide natural wellness support online and in a community near you!  Every like, share, and financial contribution goes a long way. In the willingness of the universe and all things Devine and good I appreciate any contribution. Giving Thanks

story:
We are building an indoor classroom to provide shelter for year-round learning and to run our own yoga classes, workshops and retreats.

We are The Cherry Wood Project www.cherrywoodproject.co.uk We live in 40 acres of organic woodland.  We run courses in greenwood-work, yurt-building, woodland crafts and bushcraft, we also teach woodland management & permaculture. We offer opportunitues for at-risk kids and school/college children who come to learn more about nature and our off-grid, low-impact sustainable lifestyle. We have a volunteers day every Thursday with a thriving community of volunteers who come to share skills, work hard, eat together and enjoy being in the woods. Each year in the Spring and Autumn we run a volunteers' project week, during which we will build our woodland classroom/yoga studio. We have 2 apprentices who live with us for 10 months of the years and a volunteer cook every summer. 

We need funds to pay the digger-driver to sympathetically landscape the area, to pay the sawmill, buy stones for the dry-stone wall foundations, straw bales, straw and sand for the plastering (we have our own mud/clay!), windows, woodburner, more yoga mats, cushions, solar panel & batteries, LED lights. The volunteers who help us build the classroom are gaining the huge opportunity to learn roundwood timber-framing, dry stone walling and construction skills, whether they have experience or are completely novice they will ultimately learn how to build a straw-bale building from scratch! We collaborate and create together as a community, living and working off-grid in sustainable woodland.

story:
Learn more about our amazing product line here:

Our New And Improved Herbally Pure High Potency 
Liquid Vitamins Are Loaded With Minerals and Antioxidants as seen on TV on "The View" with Whoopi Goldberg.  Also seen on Small Brand Nation!

                                                     

Herbally Pure is a Vegan friendly product with No Fructose and Now Electrolyte Enhanced!

USA SHIPPING ONLY FOR NOW SORRY!!


Herbally Pure is Happy to announce we have aligned with "Be Someone's Hero" anti bullying non-profit. 5% of all our proceeds after the indiegogo round will go to supporting this great cause!! Please visit them today! www.besomeoneshero.net

Here is what we need help with and in exchange you will get some great discounts and perks!

Herbally Pure is raising money to ramp up our first NEW batch of our 5 different sized bottles. We would also like to revamp our website to include other marketing avenues and product development.

We are relaunching the Herbally Pure product line after being off the market for a few years and now under new ownership and direction.  We have past customers that are very glad we are coming back to market and have great marketing, sales and networking outlets set up once we are in full production.

We will also have an amazing fundraising / affiliate marketing platform.

Once we have successfully raised the needed money we seek with your help we will have product available within 4-6 weeks.

  • We are looking to raise $45,000 which will help us get our products back into full production at our laboratory we have worked with in the past in Naples Florida! We are a USA developed and produced company.

  • We will be offering some amazing discounts and perks during this round of funding included but not limited to at cost pricing, wholesale pricing, affiliate incentives and a Trip for 2 to Miami for 3 days and 2 nights including dinner with the founders! There will be additional items attached to each product perk as we move forward.

  • If we do not achieve our entire funding goal we will do another round of funding to get our amazing products off the ground.  BUT with that said all orders will be fullfilled. BUT also know we might only run a few of the SKUs which means you could be getting a different size bottle or products. Some of the money raised will be used for more marketing and website updates. But we are positive with your help and the correct education be given to individuals, families and organizations, we will hit our goal and then some!

Herbally Pure has 5 Amazing product sizes that will help you and your families health:

1) 32oz bottle  

2) 16oz bottle

3) 8oz MultiVitamin RTD (ready to drink) bottles 

4) 12 pack case of 2oz shot bottles (a name change will be made to: Super Vitamin Shot!)

5)  Vitamin Water Kit consists of a 16oz concentrate Herbally Pure bottle and a 20oz BPA friendly reusable water bottle.

Herbally Pure also has two 1 minute TV commercials in English and Spanish for future use as well as a 30 second video. We have also partnered with Sports Shop Network to help and promote Herbally Pure on their eCommerce website and TV shopping channel that is launching soon.


THE PLAN:


We believe we are bringing the Healthiest, True to Label Liquid Vitamin Product to Market! Too many Liquid vitamins on the market over inflate their ingredients and OFTEN over load them into their products.  Not only can this be harmful by taxing your kidneys and it also sends a bad message to consumers that more is better. In this case that is not true.

We will officially launch an Fundraising and Affiliate program to help those schools, sports teams, colleges, non profits and others to raise money for their causes.  We will continue to let those programs continue to raise money after their set date.  This will give continued support at discount prices and ongoing health & wellness for their community, friends and family.

CHALLENGES:

Our biggest challenge in the beginning will be re-educating the general public on why "Herbally Pure" Liquid Vitamins are the healthier choice than other vitamins on the market.  We need to be able to show them educated research that 99.9% of the Liquid vitamins on the market are actually bad for your health.  First of all the other Liquid Vitamins on the market that claim to be All Natural are not. Consumers can look at the expiration on their current vitamins and if the expiration date is over 1 year it has an artificial preservative.

Our Herbally Pure brand is true to label and our All Natural preservative is only good for 1 year.  Also we have articles that can educate WHY Liquid Vitamins Vs. Pill choices are much healthier for you and environment.

Our second biggest challenge will be fulfilling large purchase orders from companies such as Wal-mart, Whole foods and others that have taken interest.

How to back us!

Backing Herbally Pure on Indiegogo is simple and secure, and open to everyone. (We are currently only shipping to the USA but with your help we will expand quicker)

  • Log into your Indiegogo account (or create a new account).  

  • Click “Contribute” at the top of this page or directly click one of the rewards.

  •  Confirm your pledge amount and select the reward you want to receive. 

  • Submit your payment information. Done. That’s it! And a HUGE Thank You!!

Other Ways You Can Help:

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help.  There are many ways you can help and they vary from:

  • Spreading the word via your friends, family and social media outlets. This Indiegogo has great sharing tools!

  • Contact your local fundraiser, school and more to let them know we will have an amazing "healthy" fundraising platform coming soon! 

  • Educate others on their vitamins if they think it is "All Natural" and has an expiration date over 1 year it is NOT!

  • Also, that just because their products has 200 - 3000% percent of the RDA it is NOT healthier. The most we have in most of our vitamins is at the 125% ratio which is recommended by the FDA. 

  • If you can not help now think of us in the future and send us good karma!

  • We will be helping families big and small in health and wealth.

story:
Back by popular demand, this year's T-shirt campaign celebrates the tenth anniversary of Twilight! :)

As in past years, I am producing a Forever in Forks T-shirt. However, unlike past years, this will be THE ONLY PLACE TO GET ONE! Check out this year's beautiful design to celebrate the 10th anniversary of Twilight.

T-shirts will be printed at the end of the campaign and mailed to US residents by July 31st. (shipping is included in the price!) For international contributors, you can pick up your shirt from me in Forks. :)
I am also cleaning out the Twi-room! So feel free to peruse some of the goodies here! I'd rather they go to good, Twilight-loving homes than end up in the yard sale/donation bin. :) <3's     All perks include shipping costs!
Postcards

Stickers and Buttons

Forks Earrings

The original Forever Party Swag Bag

And the Forever in Forks Swag Bag

Each swag bag will be filled with random twilight goodies such as Bella's engagement ring, a Bella saints bracelet, Forever in Forks slap bracelets, Bella and Edward's cottage key, Dreamcatchers, Bookmarks and more!
Plus, I've got complete sets of the Breaking Dawn Part 2 SDCC exclusive swag for you guys!


Finally, perfect for the Twihard in your life, or to treat yourself, I have the Breaking Dawn Part 2 combo pack, including the Valentine's tin and travel mug!


Thank you!!!

story:
Midwives Make a Positive Impact in Guatemala

Midwives Hannah Friewald and Sandra Lopez, founders of  Asociación Manos Abiertas (AMA), are turning the tide for women and families in Guatemala. AMA delivers comprehensive reproductive, maternal and newborn health services for over 3500 clients that would otherwise have no access to quality midwifery care.  With a focus on providing excellent health care services to women living in poor, mostly rural areas of Guatemala, over 70% of Manos Abiertas’ clientele work in the agricultural sector and are of indigenous Mayan decent. Indigenous people make up 40% of the population in Guatemala, but account for 62% of all maternal deaths. 

All services at AMA are provided in a safe and welcoming environment by local midwives who understand the importance of respecting women's choices and delivering quality care. AMA is saving lives. But, this clinic is desperately underfunded, as many of the women they serve cannot afford to pay for services.

Help us support midwives on the front lines to provide quality midwifery care where it matters most.

Donate now to sponsor a woman with few resources and help to improve maternal health outcomes in a region where  a woman is 67 times more likely to die from preventable causes during pregnancy and childbirth compared to her American counterpart.

Every dollar will be MATCHED by Midwife International, making your donation go twice as far. 

We are an all volunteer organization which means that 100% of your donation will go directly to our partners and programs in Guatemala. 

Together, we can ensure that more women have access to a skilled and respectful midwife.

story:
Thank you for visiting this Chub Fat Bike campaign, we have since relisted this for another 35 day extention, the link is attached below!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/chub-fat-tire-bikes/x/10601290#/

Please inquire with any questions !!!

A good fat bike is beautifully designed, exceptionally stout, light, ergonomic and safe...Then what does a great fat bike look like you ask?  

Well that’s simple, all of the above features and a straight forward price not inflated by multitudes of middle men....A price that you want and will gladly pay including FREE SHIPPING to all continental USA locations!  

You simply don't need to compromise on the quality of your ride; instead compromise on all those added charges keeping you from the fat bike you deserve.

Our direct sales model is the poster child of modern commerce!  We have done our research and we have heard what the average enthusiast wants and needs and we've finally arrived to deliver exactly that...Through our global partnerships with streamlined manufacturing and through economies of scale we are able to provide a refreshing new value in cycling.

CHUB Fat Bikes has partnered with one of the top frame fabricators on the planet, they produce bikes for many of the top global brands and their quality is outstanding and consistent.  We have cooperated with them on this bike concept to shake up the fat tire bike niche AND REGARDLESS OF REACHING OUR CAMPAIGN GOALS OR NOT WE WILL FULFILL EVERY ORDER!

...As you will see below, point by point we offer a comparable product to other mid to high end machines, complete with unparalleled warranties and customer service..But of course costing hundreds less. 

Its just how we roll, why pay more when you don't need to?  


Our CHUB Fat Tire bike has an early adopter price of only $429.00 (plus delivery) That is literally hundreds less than the nearest competitor with similar specifications..Its by far the BEST VALUE AVAILABLE!!  WHY PAY MORE? 

Our eventual full retail price of $599.00 is also way beneath the competition by a significant margin....So if you miss the boat in our early adopter specials you're still saving a bundle.


                      SPECS

·Frame : S/M/L/XL  -  CHUB 6061 Butted Aluminium Alloy with Replaceable Derailleur Hanger, Machined Tapered Headtube!

Average Weight - 34lbs 

·Delivered with MONSTER FAT TIRES (one of two styles

·Headset : CHUB Alloy

·Handlebar : CHUB Alloy

·Stem : CHUB Alloy

·Brakes : Avid Disc Brakes 160mm

·Cables : Shimano Sealed

·Rims : CHUB Alloy 100mm 32H Anodized black

·Hub Fr: CHUB Alloy

·Hub Rr : CHUB Alloy 8/9sp Shimano compatible

·Fr Derailleur : Shimano Altus

·Rr Derailleur : Shimano Altus

·Shifter (Fr&Rr) : Shimano Altus Rapid Fire - 27 gears

·Casette : Shimano Deore

·Chain : KMC 9spd

·Brake lever : CHUB Alloy Performance

·Crankset : CHUB Alloy Performance Line (arm length : 170mm)

·Bottom Bracket : Shimano Sealed


             


                                26" WHEEL CHUB DECAL COLOR OPTIONS!

                                    (Also Available in a Matte Black Decal Option) 

         

HAVE A LITTLE BOY OR GIRL? 

WANT TO RIDE TOGETHER IN STYLE?

INTRODUCING THE 20" WHEEL CHUBBIE!  

ONLY $439.00 for the WHOLE CAMPAIGN! 

(Compare to Specialized Fatboy 20 @ $995!...We are less than half)


7/8+ YEARS OLD RECOMMENDED

(Lots of adjustability as the child grows, however Please Refer to Sizing Chart)

VERY SAFE, COMES COMPLETE WITH REFLECTOR SET 

ALSO AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLOR ACCENT DECALS!

                                          

PRODUCT ACCESSORIES/CAMPAIGN BENCHMARK BONUSES:

The TWIN LASER TAIL LIGHT!

The perfect addition to either the adult or children's model....The Twin Laser/LED Tail Light with Laser projected rider lanes (optional on or off) uses smart new technology ensuring additional safety when riding on roads where high visibility is imperative! Very easy to install, operates on rechargeable batteries.  Very cool.

CAMPAIGN SPECIAL...Only $35

*This optional accessory is also a Benchmark Campaign Reward once 50 Chub/Chubbie Bikes have been sold!


WATER PROOF - DUAL LENS, ULTRA BRIGHT CREE/LED HEADLIGHT!               

         

Finned Alloy Housing to Cool

Three Function (Single, Dual, Strobe) 

Power Source: 1 x 8.4V 2400mAh Battery Pack

Runtime: About 2.5 hours

Battery Charger (include):

Voltage: 100V ~ 240V

LED Indication for: Power On / Charging / Full charge

Color: Black

Weight: 486g


CAMPAIGN SPECIAL AT $60 - Available in the Perks Section

*As a Benchmark Bonus we are including this Headlight and Tail light combo in Final Retail Pricing Perk @ $599 (a combined $90 value in lights!)


Meet The Founders!
                         

Clay W. - CEO of WMW, Chub Bikes Campaign Director/Product Design

                                      

CHUB/CHUBBIE 

FULFILLMENT SCHEDULE 

(MID TO LATE AUGUST FOR DELIVERIES)


Risks and Challenges

Crowdfunding is based on the developers’ accountability towards the backers. Us towards you. Trust is therefore our most valuable asset, and we take that very, very seriously. Here are the six most important components of this Indiegogo campaign for matters relevant to you, the customer:

1. Shipping Service: 

Shipping charges are unfortunately unnavoidable, but we are absorbing a portion of these fees anticipating potential volume discounts.  listed in the Perks Section of the campaign, one must be included with every bike order. They will be arranged through USPS or UPS depending on your location. When your order is to be dispatched, you will be provided with a tracking number. As per our standards, all of our shipments are insured for their full value.  If there is an issue upon receipt or if, for some reason, the bike is damaged during shipping, we will work out a solution with you in a quick and efficient manner.

We have done it in the past with other products so we know what we're doing! Our logistics are in place and very tight...We have your back. 

2. Shipping Delays:

After manufacture, your CHUB will be shipped by ground service to all orders located in continental USA or via air delivery for all oversees orders.  Therefore, depending on where you are located shipping should take between 3-15 days once it is out of our hands.  Please note that the shipment can also be delayed while going through customs for our global clients. Our team will be available to monitor your orders and answer your question during transit.

3. Shipping Charges: 

All continental USA orders NOW HAVE FREE SHIPPING (Valued at $119) Worldwide orders require: $295.  

Nice and easy and cheaper than the competition!  Even factoring the unavoidable shipping fees we are STILL Hundreds Less Than the Competition!

4. Warranty: 

Unlike many other Indiegogo projects, we are already an incorporated company, this means we are fully accountable to our customers for any manufacturing defects and we hold customer service in the highest regard!  Each of our Chub fat tire bikes carry a lifetime warranty on the frame...Thats right LIFETIME!   Every other component carries a one year warranty. We will work with you as best we can in any situation that may arise, these are VERY durable performance machines, over engineered by design...Satisfaction guaranteed.

5. Assembly:

The bikes will be shipped 85% assembled. The wheels, handlebar, seat post as well as other minor components must be assembled upon receipt. Certain other minor adjustments might be required after assembly, such as the derailleur and the brakes. If you are not familiar with bicycle mechanics, we suggest you have it assembled by a professional in a local bike shop, or just give us a call we would be happy to talk you through basic adjustments!

6. General Feasibility:

Having previously launched multiple successful startups, we have had our share of trials and tribulations: that is the reality of all entrepreneurs. As a result, we had to work hard to execute solutions and successful action plans so we have a firm understanding of the road ahead.  It doesn’t mean that we expect a cake walk but we are ready and willing to face this challenge and follow-through with what we promise.

Act Now!  Our early adopter deals and add-on's are destined to go quick....Feel rest assured that you are going to get one hell of a fatty and at the best price. 

We are certain you will love our product when it arrives, in fact we guarantee it...If for any reason you are not satisfied within 15 days of receipt and we can't seem to find a resolution via phone or email we will accept it back for a full refund minus shipping costs....Its our declaration to you that we absolutely stand by our product so you can rest assured you will be VERY HAPPY with your CHUB Fat Tire Bike.   


Thanks for checking us out, let us know if you have any questions!

Clay W. - CEO of WMW, Chub Bikes Campaign Director/Product Design
Globe trotter, AVID two wheel enthusiast, technologist, lover of the outdoors, import/export specialist and rabble-rouser!...Clay is the consummate entrepreneur with 15+ years in business development.
Over the last 12 Years Clay has started a handful of businesses with successful exits in industries ranging from securities trading to skin care...Motorsport vehicles to payment processing solutions...And the fun has just begun!    
With so many wide and varied interests its been his insatiable desire since day one to coincide his business acumen with his growing list of passions and hobbies....The goal always to create disruptive technology or business practices that operate in a socially aware and economically responsible fashion ensuring consumer satisfaction again and again.  
     



Amarylis P. - Chub Bikes Administrative - Global Sourcing/Logistics SpecialistAvid Cyclist, Aviation Enthusiast, Adventurer, Foodie and Import/Export Specialist...Amy's experience in oversees sourcing, trade relations, administrative management and logistics makes her the optimal partner to assist in delivering products exactly as promised and in a timely fashion.

story:
I am Dr Ruchi Saxena-Dhakal. I am the Founder-member at Karuna Healthcare, Nepal and Chetanalaya, Institute for Humanity, Peace and Spirituality, a Healthcare Excellence consultant and a holistic care practitioner. I have a masters degree in Homoeopathy and Management and a Diploma in Acupuncture. I am from Mumbai and now based in Kathmandu.

Nepal has been deeply affected by the recent earthquake. For working on the physical ailments as well as psychological impact of trauma, we are establishing a holistic clinic that will provide an integrated care program using Homoeopathy and Acupuncture. We shall also cater to general ailments and well-being of the community. 

This will be a Community Clinic with a 'Pay-as-you-Like' model located in Kathmandu and Free Mobile Clinics to respond to calls for trauma camps from remote locations and partner NGOs and community centers, including orphanages, schools, monasteries and hospitals.

We shall be using the following methods and protocols:

- Classical Homoeopathy

- Somatic Acupuncture

- Moxibustion

- Cupping

- Guasha

- Ear Acupuncture

- Scalp Acupuncture

- Facial Acupuncture

- Electro Acupuncture

- Laser Acupuncture

- Foot Reflexology

- NADA Protocol

- Non Somatic Extra Vessels Healing 

- Battlefield Protocol

What We Need

We will be starting the clinic from scratch and need contributions from the community for purchase or donation of the following materials

- Homoeopathic dilutions and mother tinctures

- Pills and bottles

- Acupuncture needles

- Electro acupuncture device

- Cups

- Laser acupuncture device

- Probes, rollers, guasha

- Miscellaneous clinical supplies

The Impact

We hope by our little effort, we will be able to provide a healing that goes much deeper than medications and bandages. With physical as well as mental balance restored, communities will be able to look beyond the earthquake and focus on the restoration of their lives ahead.  

Other Ways You Can Help

You can recommend us to people who can donate free supplies, like manufacturers, distributors and company owners. Or at least, give us heavy discounts.

We thank you in advance.

story:
What We're All About

Wanda Organic founder-director Marion Moon, a visionary young Kenyan entrepreneur, sees a peaceful and prosperous Africa, in which our resources are managed sustainably for the benefit of all people and the secure future of our planet. She recognizes real opportunity in the challenges presented by issues of global food security, climate change, and population growth.

Wanda’s focus is on the most abundant natural resource we have, the soil. By bringing farmers, the very latest in bio-organic soil fertility technologies, Wanda enables them to produce more and better food than ever before, thus increasing profitability and family incomes, improving nutrition, creating new employment, developing rural economies, while restoring and strengthening the health of Africa’s soil.

With assistance from  the  United States Agency for International Development (USAID)  Kenya  “Feed The Future” Innovation Engine Program (KFIE) – we have successfully demonstrated and trialed the products with smallholder farmer groups in Machakos County, Kenya. The products have proven their worth. Demand is now rising fast.

Unfortunately the current supply chain requires farmers do travel long distances to access fertilizers (synthetic fertilizers that when used in isolation, are damaging the soil). We want to develop a supply chain that enables convenience and accessibility of bio-organic fertilizers.

We collaborated  with IDEO.org to design a customer-focused distribution and service model for the smallholder sector.  We have prototyped various elements and refined the design and are ready to roll out the pilot but lack the neccessary capital.

The Kenya Climate Innovation Centre (KCIC) and InfoDev support us in developing our technology. Their support included training from the Crowdfund Capital Advisors Group (CCA) about crowdfunding. So here we are:

We need your help to raise 45,000 US Dollars to conduct the pilot.

Out of this money that we will raise:

·  61% is to be used to build 2 village – level distribution centers

·  14% is to be used to develop mini orchards and gardens at the distribution center to be used as training and demonstration sites.

·  4% is used to recruit 2 agents to manage the centers

·  The remaining 21% is to be used on administrative expenses to execute the pilot project.

After a 2.5-year process attaining the Government Approvals we are very excited about taking Wanda to the next phase of transforming rural agriculture.




The Impact

Contributing to this project is an opportunity for contributors to positively aid in the mitigation of one of the greatest challenges of the 21st century, CLIMATE CHANGE. Improved plant health and growth means that more carbon dioxide will be sequestered by plants hence reducing the amount of CO2 in the atmosphere (a greenhouse gas responsible for global warming) Improved soil fertility and structure will also lead to an increase in the agricultural productivity of people in Kenya and consequently improving the food security not only of people in Africa but to the billions of people who import food from Africa. The increased agricultural output and nutritional value of crops from the farms means that farmers can get a higher price for their produce  

Flowchart with a summary of the benefits that accrue to farmers as a result of improved soil fertility.                                                                                          

The Rewards of Giving

As our esteemed partners in our efforts to positively impact the lives of millions of Kenyans in this campaign, here are some of the rewards that you will get as rewards for your contributions.



Other Modes Of Support

We really would appreciate it if you would help us promote the campaign to your family and friends by word of mouth, Sharing campaign materials and social media activity. This will go a long way to make this campaign a success!!

·  61% is to be used to build
2 village – level distribution centers 
·  14% is to be used to
develop mini orchards and gardens at the distribution center to be used as
training and demonstration sites. 
·  4% is used to recruit 2
agents to manage the centers 
·  The remaining 21% is to
be used on administrative expenses to execute the pilot project. 
After a 2.5-year process attaining the Government Approvals we are very excited about taking Wanda to the next phase of
transforming rural agriculture. 





 

The Impact

Contributing to this project is an opportunity for contributors
to positively aid in the mitigation of one of the greatest challenges of the 21st
century, CLIMATE CHANGE. Improved plant health and growth means that more
carbon dioxide will be sequestered by plants hence reducing the amount of CO2
in the atmosphere (a greenhouse gas responsible for global warming) Improved
soil fertility and structure will also lead to an increase in the agricultural
productivity of people in Kenya and consequently improving the food security
not only of people in Africa but to the billions of people who import food from
Africa. The increased agricultural output and nutritional value of crops from the farms means that farmers can get a higher price for their produce  
Flowchart with a summary of the benefits that accrue to farmers as a result of improved soil fertility.                                                                                           


The Rewards of Giving

As our esteemed partners in our efforts to positively impact the lives of millions of Kenyans in this campaign, here are some of the rewards that you will get as rewards for your contributions.



Other Modes Of Support
We really would appreciate it if you would help us promote the campaign to your family and friends by word of mouth, Sharing campaign materials and social media activity. This will go a long way to make this campaign a success!!

story:
Come together.

Join I AM THAT GIRL chapter leaders in raising funds to build a school for children that would otherwise not have access to education. You can help girls all over the world find their voices. You can make a difference.

Each year, children around the world do not receive adequate schooling due to factors such as limited access of educational facilities and poor financial status. Because of their limited educational opportunities, these children often become entrenched in a positive feedback cycle of poverty. Pencils of Promise founder & CEO, Adam Braun, recognized that the creation of generational poverty can be solved with one simple item: a pencil.

Since forming the non-profit organization, Adam has seen the formation of over 20,000 schools and has witnessed the changed lives and futures of the 31,244 students attending these schools. With an estimated impact of over 300,000 lives due to this organization's work, Pencils of Promise has accomplished the feat of impacting large communities by giving them tangible and necessary resources, including but not limited to supplies, teachers, and school buildings.

Alexis Jones and Emily Greener understand the dramatic possibilities that become available when a girl recognizes her intrinsic worth. In their own words, founders Jones and Greener explain that I Am That Girl is a non-profit organization that seeks to “transform self-doubt into self-love by providing a safe space to be lifted up and have honest conversations about things that matter.”

By curating a culture of acceptance and encouragement, these women have allowed females in all parts of the world to express their tales of triumph and adversity in both local and online communities. With an online community of over 150,000 and over 100 local chapters in place, I Am That Girl reaches girls all over the world with confidence-building initiatives and encouraging messages.

In recognition of the overlapping values between I AM THAT GIRL & Pencils of Promise, the chapter leaders of I Am That Girl have set the goal of raising $25,000 in the names of both I Am That Girl and Pencils of Promise. With your help, we can raise the funds to build a school for children that would otherwise not have access to education. We can raise the funds to allow girls around the world find their own voices. We can make a difference. Please join us on our quest to help others become the best versions of themselves.

Donate today.

story: Hi I would like to raise money so I can buy suplies for my store. I've had it up for almost a year now but I've really wanting to get more into having the store open. What my store is it's a store for selling modded Rubik's cubes. Before I had people send in the cubes for me to mod but now I actually want to sell pre modded cubes. My site's store is http://mikeni.startlogic.com/ I'll also use the money to buy a better domain name. The money will also be used for international shipping.

story:
Partner with Bank of Books to bring the

Literary Hall of Fame to Ventura County and Malibu


and expand the Rare Book Museum in Malibu.  


We are honored to have been voted #1 Independent Bookstore of Ventura County year after year. 

We are pleased to provide quality new, used and rare books to Ventura and Malibu.  


We have also given away over 300, 000 books free to the public.                              We know of no other bookstore in the country that has done this.

Help promote literacy as we create the Ventura County and Malibu Literary Hall of Fame and Rare Book Museum. This will honor local authors both past and present.

  We have had this idea for many years, but realize that your help is needed to make it happen.  As an independent bookstore we have had many challenges, but are excited to move forward with this project. 

The Literary Hall of Fame will complement the tourist industry by having displays and special events honoring authors from various time eras.  It will become a "must-see" destination.   Our operation has had hundreds of author signings and book launches.  This project gives us an opportunity to increase these events so our communities can meet New York Bestselling Authors as well as local authors.  Authors will be honored on a regular basis with awards given and their names listed on plaques in the Hall of Fame.

Authors today have greater challenges getting their works recognized and published.  We will stand with them attempting to accomplish this.  Our owner, Clarey Rudd, currently serves on a national task force addressing these issues.

One of our featured authors will be Erle Stanley Gardner, who starting writing the Perry Mason series while living and practicing law in Ventura.



For cookbook lovers our Abednego Book Shoppe location is in the top 25 best stocked cookbook stores in the nation!  We plan on featuring cookbook authors as well.


All donations are appreciated.

   Phase 1 will help cover the construction needs, rents, racks, furniture, special         lighting, alarm systems, signage, advertising campaigns, staffing, inventory development and stock for the Ventura and Malibu Literary Hall of Fame and     Malibu Rare Book Museum.

   When we reach our Phase 1 goal we will launch Phase 2, which will be an art gallery  honoring local artists and especially book illustrators past and present.

   We cannot do this by ourselves! Now is the time for you, the literary world, and the community to show your support.  The local communities and authors will benefit from additional services and inventory selections from the Ventura County and Malibu Literary Hall of Fame and the Malibu Rare Book Museum.


Find us at www.bankofbooks.com  and facebook.com/bankofbooks

story:
Hi, I am Kimiko Uriu, a Tea Sommelier and one of the first Certified Tea Specialists from the Specialty Tea Institute of New York. 

I worked for a leading Japanese tea company for several years, where I participated in each step of the tea production process - working in the tea field, factory production, tea ceremony, sales, and brand development. 

I continued traveling the world in the search of unique and delicious teas and looking for easy solutions to drink tea: KIMICHA Tea was born. The Jin Jun Mei black tea is from the remote tea farms in the Wuyi Mountains. This unique tea won an international award for the Best Black Tea. This exquisite tea can be re-steeped up to 6 times without getting bitter! I have found a unique and delicious set of teas where customers have said "I am your customer for life". By offering these unique teas from the farm to cup, people can purchase them with a good conscience, knowing that these have been carefully selected.

KIMICHA Tea

KIMICHA Tea offers a wide selection of fine teas from tea farmers around the world. We are the sole Canadian importers of many Chinese and Korean teas, and we love to share our passion for tea. 
Our Mission is to offer teas from farm to cup, sourcing our teas from people and farms that we know well.

Higher quality tea in biodegradable tea bags

After listening to the feedback from many customers, we discovered that there is a lot of demand for our high quality teas in a more convenient format.
We want to ensure the quality of our teas by packing them ourselves and make sure that the material for our tea bags is biodegradable, unlike many tea bags currently available on the market. 
What will we use the funding for?

We already have invested in the blends, market testing and teas. We have a location for the machine once we get it. 

We are asking for $24,000 in funding for three key items:

  • Purchasing natural, biodegradable filter-paper ($4,000)
  • Printing new boxes and materials ($1,000)
  • Purchasing a machine so we can manufacture our high quality loose leaf tea in the convenience of tea bags ($19,000) 
Help us and become part of our story.

What's in it for you?

You are helping a small business, while showing your support for organic, small-scale tea production:

  • You get 100% natural tea - nothing artificial or synthetic
  • You will receive our tea in convenient to-go tea bags or loose leaf if you prefer
  • Show public support for organic, small-scale tea production
  • Every single backer gets their name on our thank you page
  • Once the machine has arrived, we'll package the delicious teas and sent them to you!
We will deliver: convenience, great flavour and affordable tea directly from tea farmers around the world.

Perks


All of the teas listed in our perks are hand-selected by Kimiko Uriu.

The first six teas we are converting to tea bags are our Plum Cinnamon, English Breakfast, Moroccan Mint, Lemongrass Ginger, award-winning Classic Green tea and Organic Earl Grey. All of these teas are organic and some of our customer favourites. These 6 teas will be in our sampler box (three of each flavour).

Farming is hard work, which requires a lot of knowledge, patience and skill. Mass-produced tea has threatened the value and price of tea. 

  • Shortages of skilled labour for picking the tea leaves which increase the cost of producing hand-made tea.
  • Increasingly automized or mechanized production methods that can compromise the quality of tea.
  • The high labour intensity of tea farming and volumes of scale that tea farmers have to compete with have led to many farmers giving up on tea farming and moving to becoming tea merchants instead.
By buying most of our teas directly from the farms, instead of through huge brokers, we hope to help farmers become self-reliant. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If your cupboard is already full of tea and you can't make a contribution, that's okay! You can still help us by getting the word out to anyone else you know who loves tea! We thank you for anything!

  • Click here to like us on our Facebook page
  • Click here to follow us on Twitter @kimichatea
  • Post our campaign link on your wall and website
  • Spread the word! Click on those "share" tools! Word of mouth is so effective.

We Need You! We look forward to sharing a cup of tea with you!

Sincerely,

Kimiko Uriu, KIMICHA Tea Founder

story:
What is the New Eden Project?

Driving sane solutions to fix the world...

You may have seen us pushing a car 200 miles, from Arlington to Austin TX, with our slogan "WHY ARE WE PUSHING A BROKEN SYSTEM?" 
It's easy to look around and see all the wrong in the world, but our focus is on the solutions. We don't have all the answers, but we know collectively we do and we are asking the questions that get us thinking for ourselves about this world that we all make for ourselves and ways we can make it better. 
Some solutions we are focused on are:

  • Food-Forests permaculture http://youtu.be/OVE8YRF7Uzg

  • Earthships, self-sustainable stuctures made of mostly earth and garbage. They collect and treat water, grow food and stay at a comfortable temp without electricity. http://earthship.com/

  • Futurist movements inspired by Jacque Fresco and many others who have put decades of practical thought into this. https://www.thevenusproject.com/en/

We are filming everything from the car push to completing our first builds.

We are filming everything.

We will be filming everything, then uploading our footage to http://HitRECord.org

( http://www.hitrecord.org/records/1754082  is our project)  This platform will help give us with editing the documentary and give us more attention to a huge community and TV audiences.

With the funds we can update our equipment for the documentary to up production quality (Canon 6D with 24-107mm kit) and professional editing.

We will obtain all the practical knowledge and hands on training. We will take what we learn and teach (via doing) in..

  • Mexico, where my aunt, Sister Mary Ursula, runs 5 orphanages and has built a hospital out of donated materials as a collaborative effort with the locals, who are accustomed to living in cardboard boxes and not knowing where their next meal is coming from.

  • 3 immediate of the many places in North Texas that have expressed to us that they have land they want this to happen on.

  • Trade knowledge with the already started earthship communities, Dallas, Kennedale/Mansfield

  • Visit some of the impoverished Native American reservations  -if they’ll have us- so we can help them establish their own food, water, and power independence, without the need of money

We need a Trailer to collect and deliver materials to locations. 

The Impact

We are just a couple of bleeding hearts that desire to make a difference in the world, and we have the plan to do it. When you contribute to this, you are directly effecting the outcome.

There is nothing we can't do, when someone asks me if I can do something, I always say yes. When telling the family of this big plan of mine, they responded "If anyone can do it, you can."

We see a world without a need for money, or over using non renewable resources, but that idea scares people, so we need to create it wherever we can. Everyone we know fantasizes  about such, but they are all waiting for someone else to take that first step, so we're taking it

Risks & Challenges

Our Challenges are obviously the money to ensure that this all happens smoothly, along with resources. At first, this scared us, but all the support we been getting by either people who know us personally, or people who are a big fan of what we are doing. 

One way to raise awareness is by pushing a broken down car from Arlington TX to Austin TX (210 miles) with the banner that reads "WHY ARE WE PUSHING A BROKEN SYSTEM", starting Feb 17th (hopefully we can do it in 11 days or less). We will have people who want to help write down what they want on the banner and make the cause their own. This is for all of us and all of our perspectives matter.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that you may not have the cash money, but that doesn't mean you can't help. We're happy that you're excited about this and it encourages us to hear all the nice things on our http://Facebook.com/AngelaAndAntony .  It helps a lot to make some noise about us and send some traffic this way, so share and follow and grace us with conversation!

Angela and Antony Page

Phone: 972.785.7694

E-mail: ArtistAFH@gmail.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AngelaAndAntony

Website: www.artistAFH.com

Life is what you make of it, and nothing is trivial.

story:
After the financial collapse of ’08 everyone was scrambling and we were no different.  I had been laid off from my job in the Hotel industry,My wife was working as an independent nail technician scrambling to make a buck and both of us looking for a new way to survive. We moved to my wife's home town Blagoevgrad That’s when i started cooking again   All of our friends were super impressed by my talent and were begging for us to open a restaurant, and that is what we did...It didn't last, after my 1 year lease was up, the owners wouldn't renew it!!! But i was then working at the American university in Bulgaria where i turned around the canteen into a dining hall to be proud of..... In Feb 2014 i was let go...to make ends meet i started Marks guerrilla kitchen from home, to great success, which i now want to turn into a Bricks and mortar take away 20 metres from the Skaptopara campus.

We want to stay in Blago and continue to be part of the AUBG community, apply all the success we've been lucky to experience and MOST importantly the lessons of failure as well as we forge on to be crazier and tastier than we can ever imagine possible

CUT TO THE CHASE: "THIS STORY IS GREAT, BUT YOU NEED TO BREAK IT DOWN?!?":

 There is no room to "break the rules" when it comes to the COST of opening a full fledged take away. 

In our 4.5 years of experience being in Bulgaria we found this to be true too often: saving money (in the wrong places) can easily cost MUCH more money in the long run.  

Expensive mistakes affects not only the bank account, but also the staff and customer experience.  And when the customer experience suffers, the business can't make the money to pay for those mistakes anymore.

This # below is THE cost of operating in an existing take away restaurant (and can get much higher) with the look+feel we're aiming for.  These estimates were built together with a small and very experienced team that includes:

  • our brains, Ina Waterhouse, who's been the lead accountant and designer on our previous restaurant project.
  • Mark Waterhouse, former Director of Operations for the AUBG canteen. Specifically oversaw the budgets, build outs and full opening+execution of  opening  the food court and cafe in the ABF building.

This estimate is based on getting a  20 square metre space (10+ seats with a small standing area and 10 seater outside terrace)

Rather than debate about why an industrial workhorse food processor (Robot Coupe) is 900 Lv vs a 50 Lv home one, let's jump into the major line items that sets this in reality:

  • 150  $ Indiegogo cost (5%)
  • 150  $ (5%, Indiegogo's credit card processing partner to process your pledges)

After Indiegogo and other charges, we only have 2700 $ in actual funds to work with:

  • 150 $ - ( remodel- repaint and renew)
  • 750 $ - Furniture (mid-level quality: chairs, tables, stools including extras for  parties and general replenishment)
  • 1400 $ - Food Service Equipment (fridge. freezer, cooker microwave to start with)
  • 100 $ - Food and opening License (license and price of consultant to jump through city hoops)
  • 300 $ - Opening food/drink inventory (gotta get the food to make and sell ^_^)

These are the major items that budget is made up of.  Some #'s are more flexible than others, but we have to be responsible and account for delays, going over-budget, and the unexpected. 

This also doesn't include:

  •  1500 $~1+ month Operating Budget (staff payroll not including management for a 7 day a week breakfast, lunch and dinner take away restaurant when NOT overstaffed)
  • Security deposit on a lease, maintenance contracts, daily wear-and-tear repairs, daily linens and uniforms, accounting, advertising/marketing

"IS THERE A PLAN B?"

NOPE, this IS the plan and our LAST STAND. This is not the "Go Big or Go to Plan B Moment!"  We're going to give it our ALL and we're putting all our eggs in THIS basket. We hope you'll support (and enjoy the eggs while you're at it too) :)

"OK, NO PLAN B.. SO WHAT IS THE TIMELINE?"

IF these crazy shenanigans ACTUALLY goes through (it COULD happen!!):

  •  March 10th- close of Indiegogo campaign
  • Feb 10th - March 13th - secure funds through  Payments
  • Feb 10th - 18th - evaluate what can be cleaned up for soft launch/opening announcement
  • March 3-6th - test run
  •  March 7th - 8th- Soft opening to take advantage of HUGE influx of walking traffic
  • Feb 23rd - March 16th - Work on renovation of space whilst not disrupting opening
  • Mid-March - Indiegogo Backers party, Friends+Family Test and.. hopefully  FULLY OPEN if renovations finished

So what say you, you IN?!?! (pretty please?!? ^_^)


"TOO MUCH JIBBA JABBA, I WANT MORE FOOD P0RN"

"Ask and ye shall receive" (aka we got your back! ;D)

Revue the gallery at the top for Mark's food porn pictures.....:-)

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can not afford to fund my project then please forward this along and spread the word.
  • Don't for get about the share tool!
story_txt:
After the financial collapse of ’08 everyone was scrambling and we were 
no different.  I had been laid off from my job in the Hotel
 industry,My wife was working as an independent nail technician scrambling to make a buck and both of us looking for a new way
 to survive. We moved to my wife's home town Blagoevgrad That’s when i started cooking again   All of our friends were 
super impressed by my talent and were begging for us to open a 
restaurant, and that is what we did...It didn't last, after my 1 year lease was up, the owners wouldn't renew it!!! But i was then working at the American university in Bulgaria where i turned around the canteen into a dining hall to be proud of..... In Feb 2014 i was let go...to make ends meet i started Marks guerrilla kitchen from home, to great success, which i now want to turn into a Bricks and mortar take away 20 metres from the Skaptopara campus.We want to stay in Blago and continue to be part of the AUBG community, apply all the success we've been lucky to 
experience and MOST importantly the lessons of failure as well as we 
forge on to be crazier and tastier than we can ever imagine possible
 
CUT TO THE CHASE: "THIS STORY IS GREAT, BUT YOU NEED TO BREAK IT DOWN?!?":
 There is no room to "break the rules" when it comes to the COST of opening a full fledged take away. 

In our 4.5 years of experience being in Bulgaria we found this to be true
 too often: saving money (in the wrong places) can easily cost MUCH more
 money in the long run.  
Expensive mistakes affects not only the bank account, but also the 
staff and customer experience.  And when the customer experience 
suffers, the business can't make the money to pay for those mistakes 
anymore.
This # below is THE cost of operating in an existing take away
restaurant (and can get much higher) with the look+feel we're aiming 
for.  These estimates were built together with a small and very experienced team that includes:

our brains, Ina Waterhouse, who's been the lead accountant and designer on our previous restaurant project.


Mark Waterhouse, former Director of Operations for the AUBG canteen. Specifically oversaw the budgets, build 
outs and full opening+execution of  opening  the food court and cafe in the ABF building.


This estimate is based on getting a  20 square metre space (10+ seats with a small standing area and 10 seater outside terrace)
Rather than debate about why an industrial workhorse food processor 
(Robot Coupe) is 900 Lv vs a 50 Lv home one, let's jump into the major line 
items that sets this in reality:

150  $ Indiegogo cost (5%)
150  $ (5%, Indiegogo's credit card processing partner to process your pledges)

After Indiegogo and other charges, we only have 2700 $ in actual funds to work with:

150 $ - ( remodel- repaint and renew)
750 $ - Furniture (mid-level quality: chairs, tables, 
stools including extras for  parties and general replenishment)
1400 $ - Food Service Equipment (fridge. freezer, cooker microwave to start with)
100 $ - Food and opening License (license and price of consultant to jump through city hoops)
300 $ - Opening food/drink inventory (gotta get the food to make and sell ^_^)

These are the major items that budget is made up of.  Some #'s are 
more flexible than others, but we have to be responsible and account for
 delays, going over-budget, and the unexpected.  

This also doesn't include:

 1500 $~1+ month Operating Budget (staff payroll not including 
management for a 7 day a week breakfast, lunch and dinner take away restaurant when NOT 
overstaffed)
Security deposit on a lease, maintenance contracts, daily 
wear-and-tear repairs, daily linens and uniforms, accounting, 
advertising/marketing

"IS THERE A PLAN B?"
NOPE, this IS the plan and our LAST STAND. This is not the "Go Big or
 Go to Plan B Moment!"  We're going to give it our ALL and we're putting
 all our eggs in THIS basket. We hope you'll support (and enjoy the eggs
 while you're at it too) :)

"OK, NO PLAN B.. SO WHAT IS THE TIMELINE?"
IF these crazy shenanigans ACTUALLY goes through (it COULD happen!!):

 March 10th- close of Indiegogo campaign

Feb 10th - March 13th - secure funds through  Payments

Feb 10th - 18th - evaluate what can be cleaned up for soft launch/opening announcement

March 3-6th - test run
 March 7th - 8th- Soft opening to take advantage of HUGE influx of walking traffic

Feb 23rd - March 16th - Work on renovation of space whilst not disrupting opening


Mid-March - Indiegogo Backers party, Friends+Family Test and.. hopefully  FULLY OPEN if renovations finished


So what say you, you IN?!?! (pretty please?!? ^_^)

story:
• My name is Ian Carr, I was born and raised in Buffalo but I've traveled quite a bit. This city has given me a lot and I currently find myself with a unique set of skills that allows me to give back with a great addition to Buffalo. I am an experienced sculpture artist/bar tender. I have over 10 years of experience in both fields in various locations including Buffalo, NYC, and the Hamptons.


  • After traveling a bit and returning home, I found that Buffalo was a city on the rise. One essential aspect of the city that I found lacking was a creative and unique environment that draws the attention of both visitors and locals. It was at this point that I devised a completely original concept for a bar that combined both of my passions, bar-tending and art, specifically glass blowing...


  • Myself and many others believe that the concept of Buffalo Glass Bar will be listed as one of the most unique bars in America. This means great exposure for Buffalo including interviews, press, and footage on tv shows geared towards unique bars, restaurants, and cocktail culture such as Esquire's, "most unique bars in America." Contributions in forming the Buffalo Glass Bar will aid in the development of an art district in buffalo. Our studio will give live demonstrations and tours for the community to experience and learn. Our studio doors will be open during the daytime which aids in community building by hosting field trips and visits from public schools to teach children about the production of glass as well as artwork. The Buffalo Glass Bar will act as an attraction for visitors traveling through western NY, both during the day as a studio, and at night as a spectacle of interesting cocktails and presentation.

  • This type of bar will be the first of its kind, so it is hard to factor an exact dollar amount for everything. what we can figure is the cost of equipment, materials, and renovations. The funds needed will be going towards these unique pieces of equipment and the renovations that are needed to operate safely and efficiently.

  • The deals or perks offered on this campaign are all discounted prices, including glass blowing classes, artwork, hand make glassware, and even bar memberships. One of the main concepts in the bar is that every drink and plate comes on a specifically designed and hand blown glass. These glasses will be available for purchase through the gallery however they will be at a much discounted price through this campaign.

  • If the funds from this campaign don't reach the entire goal, we will still use everything we did raise towards the renovations and equipment, just simply joined alongside with independent loans and investors.
  • The Buffalo Glass Bar could very possibly be a new change in the bar entertainment industry. This could become a new format for bars everywhere and it can all start here. Plain and simple, with your contributions, the more money we can raise here, the less we'll have to borrow from a bank at a high interest rate which isn't any fun.
  • we understand that some people simply cant contribute financially. One alternative way you can help is to  share this page with others and spread the word to make our dream become a reality.

story:
Hi there! I'm Heather and I am starting a mobile ice cream company in my town of Livermore, CA.

I have raised 2 children in this awesome town and want to provide a convenient, yummy way to sell ice cream at sporting events, corporate events, birthday parties and neighborhoods. I'm like the 21st Century "Ice Cream (Wo)Man".

This is a fundraising company.  I will donate at least 10% of sales to community organizations.  I am going to work closely with the Chamber of Commerce and local schools and sporting clubs to determine groups that rely on fundraising to operate.

I am looking for $5,000 to get started.  The funds raised will be used to purchase the Ice Cream Cart, inventory, freezers, marketing and insurance.

A donation of any size will greatly help get this company off the ground!

Please share this link with family and friends.

Thank you!
-Heather
